ayas.arabic: بَرَآءَةٌ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦٓ إِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ عَـٰهَدتُّم مِّنَ ٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ
ayas.translation: Freedom from obligation (is proclaimed) from Allah and His messenger toward those of the idolaters with whom ye made a treaty.
ayas.transliteration: barā-atun minallāhi warasūlihi ilal ladhīna `āhadtum minal mushrikīn

ayas.arabic: فَسِيحُوا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ أَرْبَعَةَ أَشْهُرٍ وَٱعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّكُمْ غَيْرُ مُعْجِزِى ٱللَّهِ ۙ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مُخْزِى ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
ayas.translation: Travel freely in the land four months, and know that ye cannot escape Allah and that Allah will confound the disbelievers (in His Guidance).
ayas.transliteration: fasīḥū fil-arḍi arba`ata ash-hurin wa`lamū annakum ghayru mu`jizillāhi wa-annallāha mukhzil kāfirīn

ayas.arabic: وَأَذَٰنٌ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦٓ إِلَى ٱلنَّاسِ يَوْمَ ٱلْحَجِّ ٱلْأَكْبَرِ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ بَرِىٓءٌ مِّنَ ٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ ۙ وَرَسُولُهُۥ ۚ فَإِن تُبْتُمْ فَهُوَ خَيْرٌ لَّكُمْ ۖ وَإِن تَوَلَّيْتُمْ فَٱعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّكُمْ غَيْرُ مُعْجِزِى ٱللَّهِ ۗ وَبَشِّرِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ بِعَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍ
ayas.translation: And a proclamation from Allah and His messenger to all men on the day of the Greater Pilgrimage that Allah is free from obligation to the idolaters, and (so is) His messenger. So, if ye repent, it will be better for you; but if ye are averse, then know that ye cannot escape Allah. Give tidings (O Muhammad) of a painful doom to those who disbelieve,
ayas.transliteration: wa-adhānun minallāhi warasūlihi ilan nāsi yawmal ḥajjil-akbari annallāha barī-un minal mushrikīna warasūluh ۚ fa-in tubtum fahuwa khayrul lakum ۖ wa in tawallaytum fa`lamū annakum ghayru mu`jizillāh ۗ wabashhiril ladhīna kafarū bi`adhābin alīm

ayas.arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ عَـٰهَدتُّم مِّنَ ٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ ثُمَّ لَمْ يَنقُصُوكُمْ شَيْـًٔا وَلَمْ يُظَـٰهِرُوا۟ عَلَيْكُمْ أَحَدًا فَأَتِمُّوٓا۟ إِلَيْهِمْ عَهْدَهُمْ إِلَىٰ مُدَّتِهِمْ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُحِبُّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ
ayas.translation: Excepting those of the idolaters with whom ye (Muslims) have a treaty, and who have since abated nothing of your right nor have supported anyone against you. (As for these), fulfil their treaty to them till their term. Lo! Allah loveth those who keep their duty (unto Him).
ayas.transliteration: illal ladhīna `āhadtum minal mushrikīna thumma lam yanquṣūkum shay-an walam yuẓāhirū `alaykum aḥadan fa-atimmū ilayhim `ahdahum ilā muddatihim ۚ innallāha yuḥibbul muttaqīn

ayas.arabic: فَإِذَا ٱنسَلَخَ ٱلْأَشْهُرُ ٱلْحُرُمُ فَٱقْتُلُوا۟ ٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ حَيْثُ وَجَدتُّمُوهُمْ وَخُذُوهُمْ وَٱحْصُرُوهُمْ وَٱقْعُدُوا۟ لَهُمْ كُلَّ مَرْصَدٍ ۚ فَإِن تَابُوا۟ وَأَقَامُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتَوُا۟ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ فَخَلُّوا۟ سَبِيلَهُمْ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ
ayas.translation: Then, when the sacred months have passed, slay the idolaters wherever ye find them, and take them (captive), and besiege them, and prepare for them each ambush. But if they repent and establish worship and pay the poor-due, then leave their way free. Lo! Allah is Forgiving, Merciful.
ayas.transliteration: fa-idhan-salakhal-ash-hurul ḥurumu faqtulul mushrikīna ḥaythu wajadtumūhum wakhudhūhum wāḥṣurūhum waq`udū lahum kulla marṣad ۚ fa-in tābū wa-aqāmuṣ ṣalāta wa-ātawuz zakāta fakhallū sabīlahum ۚ innallāha ghafūrun raḥīm

ayas.arabic: وَإِنْ أَحَدٌ مِّنَ ٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ ٱسْتَجَارَكَ فَأَجِرْهُ حَتَّىٰ يَسْمَعَ كَلَـٰمَ ٱللَّهِ ثُمَّ أَبْلِغْهُ مَأْمَنَهُۥ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمْ قَوْمٌ لَّا يَعْلَمُونَ
ayas.translation: And if anyone of the idolaters seeketh thy protection (O Muhammad), then protect him so that he may hear the Word of Allah, and afterward convey him to his place of safety. That is because they are a folk who know not.
ayas.transliteration: wa in aḥadun minal mushrikīnas-tajāraka fa-ajirhu ḥattā yasma`a kalāmallāhi thumma abligh-hu ma-manah ۚ dhālika bi-annahum qawmul lā ya`lamūn

ayas.arabic: كَيْفَ يَكُونُ لِلْمُشْرِكِينَ عَهْدٌ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ وَعِندَ رَسُولِهِۦٓ إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ عَـٰهَدتُّمْ عِندَ ٱلْمَسْجِدِ ٱلْحَرَامِ ۖ فَمَا ٱسْتَقَـٰمُوا۟ لَكُمْ فَٱسْتَقِيمُوا۟ لَهُمْ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُحِبُّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ
ayas.translation: How can there be a treaty with Allah and with His messenger for the idolaters save those with whom ye made a treaty at the Inviolable Place of Worship? So long as they are true to you, be true to them. Lo! Allah loveth those who keep their duty.
ayas.transliteration: kayfa yakūnu lil-mushrikīna `ahdun `indallāhi wa`inda rasūlihi illal ladhīna `āhadtum `indal masjidil ḥarām ۖ famas-taqāmū lakum fastaqīmū lahum ۚ innallāha yuḥibbul muttaqīn

ayas.arabic: كَيْفَ وَإِن يَظْهَرُوا۟ عَلَيْكُمْ لَا يَرْقُبُوا۟ فِيكُمْ إِلًّا وَلَا ذِمَّةً ۚ يُرْضُونَكُم بِأَفْوَٰهِهِمْ وَتَأْبَىٰ قُلُوبُهُمْ وَأَكْثَرُهُمْ فَـٰسِقُونَ
ayas.translation: How (can there be any treaty for the others) when, if they have the upper hand of you, they regard not pact nor honour in respect of you? They satisfy you with their mouths the while their hearts refuse. And most of them are wrongdoers.
ayas.transliteration: kayfa wa in yaẓharū `alaykum lā yarqubū fīkum illan walā dhimmah ۚ yurḍūnakum bi-afwāhihim wata-bā qulūbuhum wa-aktharuhum fāsiqūn

ayas.arabic: ٱشْتَرَوْا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِ ٱللَّهِ ثَمَنًا قَلِيلًا فَصَدُّوا۟ عَن سَبِيلِهِۦٓ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ سَآءَ مَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ
ayas.translation: They have purchased with the revelations of Allah a little gain, so they debar (men) from His way. Lo! evil is that which they are wont to do.
ayas.transliteration: ish-taraw bi-āyātillāhi thamanan qalīlan faṣaddū `an sabīlih ۚ innahum sā-a mā kānū ya`malūn

ayas.arabic: لَا يَرْقُبُونَ فِى مُؤْمِنٍ إِلًّا وَلَا ذِمَّةً ۚ وَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْمُعْتَدُونَ
ayas.translation: And they observe toward a believer neither pact nor honour. These are they who are transgressors.
ayas.transliteration: lā yarqubūna fī mu-minin illan walā dhimmah ۚ wa-ulā-ika humul mu`tadūn

ayas.arabic: فَإِن تَابُوا۟ وَأَقَامُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتَوُا۟ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ فَإِخْوَٰنُكُمْ فِى ٱلدِّينِ ۗ وَنُفَصِّلُ ٱلْـَٔايَـٰتِ لِقَوْمٍ يَعْلَمُونَ
ayas.translation: But if they repent and establish worship and pay the poor-due, then are they your brethren in religion. We detail Our revelations for a people who have knowledge.
ayas.transliteration: fa-in tābū wa-aqāmuṣ ṣalāta wa-ātawuz zakāta fa-ikhwānukum fid dīn ۗ wanufaṣṣilul-āyāti liqawmiy ya`lamūn

ayas.arabic: وَإِن نَّكَثُوٓا۟ أَيْمَـٰنَهُم مِّنۢ بَعْدِ عَهْدِهِمْ وَطَعَنُوا۟ فِى دِينِكُمْ فَقَـٰتِلُوٓا۟ أَئِمَّةَ ٱلْكُفْرِ ۙ إِنَّهُمْ لَآ أَيْمَـٰنَ لَهُمْ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَنتَهُونَ
ayas.translation: And if they break their pledges after their treaty (hath been made with you) and assail your religion, then fight the heads of disbelief - Lo! they have no binding oaths - in order that they may desist.
ayas.transliteration: wa in nakathū aymānahum min ba`di `ahdihim waṭa`anū fī dīnikum faqātilū a-immatal kufri innahum lā aymāna lahum la`allahum yantahūn

ayas.arabic: أَلَا تُقَـٰتِلُونَ قَوْمًا نَّكَثُوٓا۟ أَيْمَـٰنَهُمْ وَهَمُّوا۟ بِإِخْرَاجِ ٱلرَّسُولِ وَهُم بَدَءُوكُمْ أَوَّلَ مَرَّةٍ ۚ أَتَخْشَوْنَهُمْ ۚ فَٱللَّهُ أَحَقُّ أَن تَخْشَوْهُ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
ayas.translation: Will ye not fight a folk who broke their solemn pledges, and purposed to drive out the messenger and did attack you first? What! Fear ye them? Now Allah hath more right that ye should fear Him, if ye are believers
ayas.transliteration: alā tuqātilūna qawman nakathū aymānahum wahammū bi-ikhrājir rasūli wahum bada-ūkum awwala marrah ۚ atakhshawnahum ۚ fallāhu aḥaqqu an takhshawhu in kuntum mu-minīn

ayas.arabic: قَـٰتِلُوهُمْ يُعَذِّبْهُمُ ٱللَّهُ بِأَيْدِيكُمْ وَيُخْزِهِمْ وَيَنصُرْكُمْ عَلَيْهِمْ وَيَشْفِ صُدُورَ قَوْمٍ مُّؤْمِنِينَ
ayas.translation: Fight them! Allah will chastise them at your hands, and He will lay them low and give you victory over them, and He will heal the breasts of folk who are believers.
ayas.transliteration: qātilūhum yu`adhhibhumullāhu bi-aydīkum wayukhzihim wayanṣurkum `alayhim wayashfi ṣudūra qawmin mu-minīn

ayas.arabic: وَيُذْهِبْ غَيْظَ قُلُوبِهِمْ ۗ وَيَتُوبُ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ مَن يَشَآءُ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌ
ayas.translation: And He will remove the anger of their hearts. Allah relenteth toward whom He will. Allah is Knower, Wise.
ayas.transliteration: wayudh-hib ghayẓa qulūbihim ۗ wayatūbullāhu `alā man yashā-u ۗ wallāhu `alīmun ḥakīm

ayas.arabic: أَمْ حَسِبْتُمْ أَن تُتْرَكُوا۟ وَلَمَّا يَعْلَمِ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ جَـٰهَدُوا۟ مِنكُمْ وَلَمْ يَتَّخِذُوا۟ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَلَا رَسُولِهِۦ وَلَا ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَلِيجَةً ۚ وَٱللَّهُ خَبِيرٌۢ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ
ayas.translation: Or deemed ye that ye would be left (in peace) when Allah yet knoweth not those of you who strive, choosing for familiar none save Allah and His messenger and the believers? Allah is Informed of what ye do.
ayas.transliteration: am ḥasibtum an tutrakū walammā ya`lamillāhul ladhīna jāhadū minkum walam yattakhidhū min dūnillāhi walā rasūlihi walal mu-minīna walījah ۚ wallāhu khabīrun bimā ta`malūn

ayas.arabic: مَا كَانَ لِلْمُشْرِكِينَ أَن يَعْمُرُوا۟ مَسَـٰجِدَ ٱللَّهِ شَـٰهِدِينَ عَلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِهِم بِٱلْكُفْرِ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ حَبِطَتْ أَعْمَـٰلُهُمْ وَفِى ٱلنَّارِ هُمْ خَـٰلِدُونَ
ayas.translation: It is not for the idolaters to tend Allah's sanctuaries, bearing witness against themselves of disbelief. As for such, their works are vain and in the Fire they will abide.
ayas.transliteration: mā kāna lil-mushrikīna an ya`murū masājidallāhi shāhidīna `alā anfusihim bil kufr ۚ ulā-ika ḥabiṭat a`māluhum wafin nāri hum khālidūn

ayas.arabic: إِنَّمَا يَعْمُرُ مَسَـٰجِدَ ٱللَّهِ مَنْ ءَامَنَ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلْيَوْمِ ٱلْـَٔاخِرِ وَأَقَامَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتَى ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَلَمْ يَخْشَ إِلَّا ٱللَّهَ ۖ فَعَسَىٰٓ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ أَن يَكُونُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلْمُهْتَدِينَ
ayas.translation: He only shall tend Allah's sanctuaries who believeth in Allah and the Last Day and observeth proper worship and payeth the poor-due and feareth none save Allah. For such (only) is it possible that they can be of the rightly guided.
ayas.transliteration: innamā ya`muru masājidallāhi man āmana billāhi wal yawmil-ākhiri wa-aqāmaṣ ṣalāta wa-ātaz zakāta walam yakhsha illallāh ۖ fa`asā ulā-ika an yakūnū minal muhtadīn

ayas.arabic: أَجَعَلْتُمْ سِقَايَةَ ٱلْحَآجِّ وَعِمَارَةَ ٱلْمَسْجِدِ ٱلْحَرَامِ كَمَنْ ءَامَنَ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلْيَوْمِ ٱلْـَٔاخِرِ وَجَـٰهَدَ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ لَا يَسْتَوُۥنَ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يَهْدِى ٱلْقَوْمَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
ayas.translation: Count ye the slaking of a pilgrim's thirst and tendance of the Inviolable Place of Worship as (equal to the worth of) him who believeth in Allah and the Last Day, and striveth in the way of Allah? They are not equal in the sight of Allah. Allah guideth not wrongdoing folk.
ayas.transliteration: aja`altum siqāyatal ḥājji wa`imāratal masjidil ḥarāmi kaman āmana billāhi wal yawmil-ākhiri wajāhada fī sabīlillāh ۚ lā yastawūna `indallāh ۗ wallāhu lā yahdil qawmaẓ ẓālimīn

ayas.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَهَاجَرُوا۟ وَجَـٰهَدُوا۟ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ بِأَمْوَٰلِهِمْ وَأَنفُسِهِمْ أَعْظَمُ دَرَجَةً عِندَ ٱللَّهِ ۚ وَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْفَآئِزُونَ
ayas.translation: Those who believe, and have left their homes and striven with their wealth and their lives in Allah's way are of much greater worth in Allah's sight. These are they who are triumphant.
ayas.transliteration: alladhīna āmanū wahājarū wajāhadū fī sabīlillāhi bi-amwālihim wa-anfusihim a`ẓamu darajatan `indallāh ۚ wa-ulā-ika humul fā-izūn

ayas.arabic: يُبَشِّرُهُمْ رَبُّهُم بِرَحْمَةٍ مِّنْهُ وَرِضْوَٰنٍ وَجَنَّـٰتٍ لَّهُمْ فِيهَا نَعِيمٌ مُّقِيمٌ
ayas.translation: Their Lord giveth them good tidings of mercy from Him, and acceptance, and Gardens where enduring pleasure will be theirs;
ayas.transliteration: yubashhiruhum rabbuhum biraḥmatim minhu wariḍwānin wajannātin lahum fīhā na`īmun muqīm

ayas.arabic: خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدًا ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عِندَهُۥٓ أَجْرٌ عَظِيمٌ
ayas.translation: There they will abide for ever. Lo! with Allah there is immense reward.
ayas.transliteration: khālidīna fīhā abadā ۚ innallāha `indahu ajrun `aẓīm

ayas.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ لَا تَتَّخِذُوٓا۟ ءَابَآءَكُمْ وَإِخْوَٰنَكُمْ أَوْلِيَآءَ إِنِ ٱسْتَحَبُّوا۟ ٱلْكُفْرَ عَلَى ٱلْإِيمَـٰنِ ۚ وَمَن يَتَوَلَّهُم مِّنكُمْ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ
ayas.translation: O ye who believe! Choose not your fathers nor your brethren for friends if they take pleasure in disbelief rather than faith. Whoso of you taketh them for friends, such are wrong-doers.
ayas.transliteration: yā-ayyuhal ladhīna āmanū lā tattakhidhū ābā-akum wa ikhwānakum awliyā-a inis-taḥabbul kufra `alal-iymān ۚ wa man yatawallahum minkum fa-ulā-ika humuẓ ẓālimūn

ayas.arabic: قُلْ إِن كَانَ ءَابَآؤُكُمْ وَأَبْنَآؤُكُمْ وَإِخْوَٰنُكُمْ وَأَزْوَٰجُكُمْ وَعَشِيرَتُكُمْ وَأَمْوَٰلٌ ٱقْتَرَفْتُمُوهَا وَتِجَـٰرَةٌ تَخْشَوْنَ كَسَادَهَا وَمَسَـٰكِنُ تَرْضَوْنَهَآ أَحَبَّ إِلَيْكُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ وَجِهَادٍ فِى سَبِيلِهِۦ فَتَرَبَّصُوا۟ حَتَّىٰ يَأْتِىَ ٱللَّهُ بِأَمْرِهِۦ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يَهْدِى ٱلْقَوْمَ ٱلْفَـٰسِقِينَ
ayas.translation: Say: If your fathers, and your sons, and your brethren, and your wives, and your tribe, and the wealth ye have acquired, and merchandise for which ye fear that there will no sale, and dwellings ye desire are dearer to you than Allah and His messenger and striving in His way: then wait till Allah bringeth His command to pass. Allah guideth not wrongdoing folk.
ayas.transliteration: qul in kāna ābā-ukum wa-abnā-ukum wa ikhwānukum wa-azwājukum wa`ashīratukum wa-amwālunq-taraftumūhā watijāratun takhshawna kasādahā wa masākinu tarḍawnahā aḥabba ilaykum minallāhi warasūlihi wajihādin fī sabīlihi fatarabbaṣū ḥattā ya-tiyallāhu bi-amrih ۗ wallāhu lā yahdil qawmal fāsiqīn

ayas.arabic: لَقَدْ نَصَرَكُمُ ٱللَّهُ فِى مَوَاطِنَ كَثِيرَةٍ ۙ وَيَوْمَ حُنَيْنٍ ۙ إِذْ أَعْجَبَتْكُمْ كَثْرَتُكُمْ فَلَمْ تُغْنِ عَنكُمْ شَيْـًٔا وَضَاقَتْ عَلَيْكُمُ ٱلْأَرْضُ بِمَا رَحُبَتْ ثُمَّ وَلَّيْتُم مُّدْبِرِينَ
ayas.translation: Allah hath given you victory on many fields and on the day of Huneyn, when ye exulted in your multitude but it availed you naught, and the earth, vast as it is, was straitened for you; then ye turned back in flight;
ayas.transliteration: laqad naṣarakumullāhu fī mawāṭina kathīratin wayawma ḥunaynin idh a`jabatkum kathratukum falam tughni `ankum shay-an waḍāqat `alaykumul-arḍu bimā raḥubat thumma wallaytum mudbirīn

ayas.arabic: ثُمَّ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ سَكِينَتَهُۥ عَلَىٰ رَسُولِهِۦ وَعَلَى ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَأَنزَلَ جُنُودًا لَّمْ تَرَوْهَا وَعَذَّبَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ ۚ وَذَٰلِكَ جَزَآءُ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
ayas.translation: Then Allah sent His peace of reassurance down upon His messenger and upon the believers, and sent down hosts ye could not see, and punished those who disbelieved. Such is the reward of disbelievers.
ayas.transliteration: thumma anzalallāhu sakīnatahu `alā rasūlihi wa`alal-mu-minīna wa-anzala junūdal lam tarawhā wa`adhhabal ladhīna kafarū ۚ wadhālika jazā-ul kāfirīn

ayas.arabic: ثُمَّ يَتُوبُ ٱللَّهُ مِنۢ بَعْدِ ذَٰلِكَ عَلَىٰ مَن يَشَآءُ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ
ayas.translation: Then afterward Allah will relent toward whom He will; for Allah is Forgiving, Merciful.
ayas.transliteration: thumma yatūbullāhu min ba`di dhālika `alā man yashā-u ۗ wallāhu ghafūrun raḥīm

ayas.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ إِنَّمَا ٱلْمُشْرِكُونَ نَجَسٌ فَلَا يَقْرَبُوا۟ ٱلْمَسْجِدَ ٱلْحَرَامَ بَعْدَ عَامِهِمْ هَـٰذَا ۚ وَإِنْ خِفْتُمْ عَيْلَةً فَسَوْفَ يُغْنِيكُمُ ٱللَّهُ مِن فَضْلِهِۦٓ إِن شَآءَ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌ
ayas.translation: O ye who believe! The idolaters only are unclean. So let them not come near the Inviolable Place of Worship after this their year. If ye fear poverty (from the loss of their merchandise) Allah shall preserve you of His bounty if He will. Lo! Allah is Knower, Wise.
ayas.transliteration: yā-ayyuhal ladhīna āmanū innamal mushrikūna najasun falā yaqrabul masjidal ḥarāma ba`da `āmihim hādhā ۚ wa in khiftum `aylatan fasawfa yughnīkumullāhu min faḍlihi in shā-a ۚ innallāha `alīmun ḥakīm

ayas.arabic: قَـٰتِلُوا۟ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱللَّهِ وَلَا بِٱلْيَوْمِ ٱلْـَٔاخِرِ وَلَا يُحَرِّمُونَ مَا حَرَّمَ ٱللَّهُ وَرَسُولُهُۥ وَلَا يَدِينُونَ دِينَ ٱلْحَقِّ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ حَتَّىٰ يُعْطُوا۟ ٱلْجِزْيَةَ عَن يَدٍ وَهُمْ صَـٰغِرُونَ
ayas.translation: Fight against such of those who have been given the Scripture as believe not in Allah nor the Last Day, and forbid not that which Allah hath forbidden by His messenger, and follow not the Religion of Truth, until they pay the tribute readily, being brought low.
ayas.transliteration: qātilul ladhīna lā yu-minūna billāhi walā bil yawmil-ākhiri walā yuḥarrimūna mā ḥarramallāhu warasūluhu walā yadīnūna dīnal ḥaqqi minal ladhīna ūtul kitāba ḥattā yu`ṭul jizyata `an yadin wahum ṣāghirūn

ayas.arabic: وَقَالَتِ ٱلْيَهُودُ عُزَيْرٌ ٱبْنُ ٱللَّهِ وَقَالَتِ ٱلنَّصَـٰرَى ٱلْمَسِيحُ ٱبْنُ ٱللَّهِ ۖ ذَٰلِكَ قَوْلُهُم بِأَفْوَٰهِهِمْ ۖ يُضَـٰهِـُٔونَ قَوْلَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِن قَبْلُ ۚ قَـٰتَلَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ ۚ أَنَّىٰ يُؤْفَكُونَ
ayas.translation: And the Jews say: Ezra is the son of Allah, and the Christians say: The Messiah is the son of Allah. That is their saying with their mouths. They imitate the saying of those who disbelieved of old. Allah (Himself) fighteth against them. How perverse are they!
ayas.transliteration: waqālatil yahūdu `uzayrunib-nullāhi waqālatin naṣāral masīḥub-nullāh ۖ dhālika qawluhum bi-afwāhihim ۖ yuḍāhi-ūna qawlal ladhīna kafarū min qabl ۚ qātalahumullāh ۚ annā yu-fakūn

ayas.arabic: ٱتَّخَذُوٓا۟ أَحْبَارَهُمْ وَرُهْبَـٰنَهُمْ أَرْبَابًا مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَٱلْمَسِيحَ ٱبْنَ مَرْيَمَ وَمَآ أُمِرُوٓا۟ إِلَّا لِيَعْبُدُوٓا۟ إِلَـٰهًا وَٰحِدًا ۖ لَّآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۚ سُبْحَـٰنَهُۥ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ
ayas.translation: They have taken as lords beside Allah their rabbis and their monks and the Messiah son of Mary, when they were bidden to worship only One Allah. There is no Allah save Him. Be He Glorified from all that they ascribe as partner (unto Him)!
ayas.transliteration: ittakhadhū aḥbārahum waruhbānahum arbāban min dūnillāhi wal masīḥab-na maryama wa mā umirū illā liya`budū ilāhan wāḥidā ۖ lā ilāha illā huw ۚ subḥānahu `ammā yushrikūn

ayas.arabic: يُرِيدُونَ أَن يُطْفِـُٔوا۟ نُورَ ٱللَّهِ بِأَفْوَٰهِهِمْ وَيَأْبَى ٱللَّهُ إِلَّآ أَن يُتِمَّ نُورَهُۥ وَلَوْ كَرِهَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ
ayas.translation: Fain would they put out the light of Allah with their mouths, but Allah disdaineth (aught) save that He shall perfect His light, however much the disbelievers are averse.
ayas.transliteration: yurīdūna an yuṭfi-ū nūrallāhi bi-afwāhihim waya-ballāhu illā an yutimma nūrahu walaw karihal kāfirūn

ayas.arabic: هُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَرْسَلَ رَسُولَهُۥ بِٱلْهُدَىٰ وَدِينِ ٱلْحَقِّ لِيُظْهِرَهُۥ عَلَى ٱلدِّينِ كُلِّهِۦ وَلَوْ كَرِهَ ٱلْمُشْرِكُونَ
ayas.translation: He it is Who hath sent His messenger with the guidance and the Religion of Truth, that He may cause it to prevail over all religion, however much the idolaters may be averse.
ayas.transliteration: huwal ladhī arsala rasūlahu bil hudā wadīnil ḥaqqi liyuẓhirahu `alad dīni kullihi walaw karihal mushrikūn

ayas.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ إِنَّ كَثِيرًا مِّنَ ٱلْأَحْبَارِ وَٱلرُّهْبَانِ لَيَأْكُلُونَ أَمْوَٰلَ ٱلنَّاسِ بِٱلْبَـٰطِلِ وَيَصُدُّونَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ۗ وَٱلَّذِينَ يَكْنِزُونَ ٱلذَّهَبَ وَٱلْفِضَّةَ وَلَا يُنفِقُونَهَا فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ فَبَشِّرْهُم بِعَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍ
ayas.translation: O ye who believe! Lo! many of the (Jewish) rabbis and the (Christian) monks devour the wealth of mankind wantonly and debar (men) from the way of Allah. They who hoard up gold and silver and spend it not in the way of Allah, unto them give tidings (O Muhammad) of a painful doom,
ayas.transliteration: yā-ayyuhal ladhīna āmanū inna kathīran minal-aḥbāri war ruhbāni laya-kulūna amwālan nāsi bil bāṭili wayaṣuddūna `an sabīlillāh ۗ wal ladhīna yaknizūnadh dhahaba wal fiḍḍata walā yunfiqūnahā fī sabīlillāhi fabashhirhum bi`adhābin alīm

ayas.arabic: يَوْمَ يُحْمَىٰ عَلَيْهَا فِى نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ فَتُكْوَىٰ بِهَا جِبَاهُهُمْ وَجُنُوبُهُمْ وَظُهُورُهُمْ ۖ هَـٰذَا مَا كَنَزْتُمْ لِأَنفُسِكُمْ فَذُوقُوا۟ مَا كُنتُمْ تَكْنِزُونَ
ayas.translation: On the day when it will (all) be heated in the fire of hell, and their foreheads and their flanks and their backs will be branded therewith (and it will be said unto them): Here is that which ye hoarded for yourselves. Now taste of what ye used to hoard.
ayas.transliteration: yawma yuḥmā `alayhā fī nāri jahannama fatukwā bihā jibāhuhum wajunūbuhum waẓuhūruhum ۖ hādhā mā kanaztum li-anfusikum fadhūqū mā kuntum taknizūn

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ عِدَّةَ ٱلشُّهُورِ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ ٱثْنَا عَشَرَ شَهْرًا فِى كِتَـٰبِ ٱللَّهِ يَوْمَ خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ مِنْهَآ أَرْبَعَةٌ حُرُمٌ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلدِّينُ ٱلْقَيِّمُ ۚ فَلَا تَظْلِمُوا۟ فِيهِنَّ أَنفُسَكُمْ ۚ وَقَـٰتِلُوا۟ ٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ كَآفَّةً كَمَا يُقَـٰتِلُونَكُمْ كَآفَّةً ۚ وَٱعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَعَ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ
ayas.translation: Lo! the number of the months with Allah is twelve months by Allah's ordinance in the day that He created the heavens and the earth. Four of them are sacred: that is the right religion. So wrong not yourselves in them. And wage war on all of the idolaters as they are waging war on all of you. And know that Allah is with those who keep their duty (unto Him).
ayas.transliteration: inna `iddatash shuhūri `indallāhith-nā `ashara shahran fī kitābillāhi yawma khalaqas samāwāti wal-arḍa minhā arba`atun ḥurum ۚ dhālikad dīnul qayyim ۚ falā taẓlimū fīhinna anfusakum ۚ waqātilul mushrikīna kāffatan kamā yuqātilūnakum kāffah ۚ wa`lamū annallāha ma`al muttaqīn

ayas.arabic: إِنَّمَا ٱلنَّسِىٓءُ زِيَادَةٌ فِى ٱلْكُفْرِ ۖ يُضَلُّ بِهِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ يُحِلُّونَهُۥ عَامًا وَيُحَرِّمُونَهُۥ عَامًا لِّيُوَاطِـُٔوا۟ عِدَّةَ مَا حَرَّمَ ٱللَّهُ فَيُحِلُّوا۟ مَا حَرَّمَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ زُيِّنَ لَهُمْ سُوٓءُ أَعْمَـٰلِهِمْ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يَهْدِى ٱلْقَوْمَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
ayas.translation: Postponement (of a sacred month) is only an excess of disbelief whereby those who disbelieve are misled; they allow it one year and forbid it (another) year, that they may make up the number of the months which Allah hath hallowed, so that they allow that which Allah hath forbidden. The evil of their deeds is made fairseeming unto them. Allah guideth not the disbelieving folk.
ayas.transliteration: innaman nasī-u ziyādatun fil kufr ۖ yuḍallu bihil ladhīna kafarū yuḥillūnahu `āman wayuḥarrimūnahu `āmal liyuwāṭi-ū `iddata mā ḥarramallāhu fayuḥillū mā ḥarramallāh ۚ zuyyina lahum sū-u a`mālihim ۗ wallāhu lā yahdil qawmal kāfirīn

ayas.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مَا لَكُمْ إِذَا قِيلَ لَكُمُ ٱنفِرُوا۟ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ٱثَّاقَلْتُمْ إِلَى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ أَرَضِيتُم بِٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا مِنَ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ ۚ فَمَا مَتَـٰعُ ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا فِى ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ إِلَّا قَلِيلٌ
ayas.translation: O ye who believe! What aileth you that when it is said unto you: Go forth in the way of Allah, ye are bowed down to the ground with heaviness. Take ye pleasure in the life of the world rather than in the Hereafter? The comfort of the life of the world is but little in the Hereafter.
ayas.transliteration: yā-ayyuhal ladhīna āmanū mā lakum idhā qīla lakumun-firū fī sabīlillāhith-hāqaltum ilal-arḍ ۚ araḍītum bil ḥayātid dunyā minal-ākhirah ۚ famā matā`ul ḥayātid dunyā fil-ākhirati illā qalīl

ayas.arabic: إِلَّا تَنفِرُوا۟ يُعَذِّبْكُمْ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًا وَيَسْتَبْدِلْ قَوْمًا غَيْرَكُمْ وَلَا تَضُرُّوهُ شَيْـًٔا ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
ayas.translation: If ye go not forth He will afflict you with a painful doom, and will choose instead of you a folk other than you. Ye cannot harm Him at all. Allah is Able to do all things.
ayas.transliteration: illā tanfirū yu`adhhibkum `adhāban alīman wayastabdil qawman ghayrakum walā taḍurrūhu shay-ā ۗ wallāhu `alā kulli shay-in qadīr

ayas.arabic: إِلَّا تَنصُرُوهُ فَقَدْ نَصَرَهُ ٱللَّهُ إِذْ أَخْرَجَهُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ ثَانِىَ ٱثْنَيْنِ إِذْ هُمَا فِى ٱلْغَارِ إِذْ يَقُولُ لِصَـٰحِبِهِۦ لَا تَحْزَنْ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَعَنَا ۖ فَأَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ سَكِينَتَهُۥ عَلَيْهِ وَأَيَّدَهُۥ بِجُنُودٍ لَّمْ تَرَوْهَا وَجَعَلَ كَلِمَةَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ ٱلسُّفْلَىٰ ۗ وَكَلِمَةُ ٱللَّهِ هِىَ ٱلْعُلْيَا ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٌ
ayas.translation: If ye help him not, still Allah helped him when those who disbelieve drove him forth, the second of two; when they two were in the cave, when he said unto his comrade: Grieve not. Lo! Allah is with us. Then Allah caused His peace of reassurance to descend upon him and supported him with hosts ye cannot see, and made the word of those who disbelieved the nethermost, while Allah's Word it was that became the uppermost. Allah is Mighty, Wise.
ayas.transliteration: illā tanṣurūhu faqad naṣarahullāhu idh akhrajahul ladhīna kafarū thāniyath-nayni idh humā fil ghāri idh yaqūlu liṣāḥibihi lā taḥzan innallāha ma`anā ۖ fa-anzalallāhu sakīnatahu `alayhi wa-ayyadahu bijunūdin lam tarawhā waja`ala kalimatal ladhīna kafarus suflā ۗ wakalimatullāhi hiyal `ulyā ۗ wallāhu `azīzun ḥakīm

ayas.arabic: ٱنفِرُوا۟ خِفَافًا وَثِقَالًا وَجَـٰهِدُوا۟ بِأَمْوَٰلِكُمْ وَأَنفُسِكُمْ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ ذَٰلِكُمْ خَيْرٌ لَّكُمْ إِن كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ
ayas.translation: Go forth, light-armed and heavy-armed, and strive with your wealth and your lives in the way of Allah! That is best for you if ye but knew.
ayas.transliteration: in-firū khifāfan wathiqālan wajāhidū bi-amwālikum wa-anfusikum fī sabīlillāh ۚ dhālikum khayrul lakum in kuntum ta`lamūn

ayas.arabic: لَوْ كَانَ عَرَضًا قَرِيبًا وَسَفَرًا قَاصِدًا لَّٱتَّبَعُوكَ وَلَـٰكِنۢ بَعُدَتْ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلشُّقَّةُ ۚ وَسَيَحْلِفُونَ بِٱللَّهِ لَوِ ٱسْتَطَعْنَا لَخَرَجْنَا مَعَكُمْ يُهْلِكُونَ أَنفُسَهُمْ وَٱللَّهُ يَعْلَمُ إِنَّهُمْ لَكَـٰذِبُونَ
ayas.translation: Had it been a near adventure and an easy journey they had followed thee, but the distance seemed too far for them. Yet will they swear by Allah (saying): If we had been able we would surely have set out with you. They destroy their souls, and Allah knoweth that they verily are liars.
ayas.transliteration: law kāna `araḍan qarīban wasafaran qāṣidal lattaba`ūka walākin ba`udat `alayhimush shuqqah ۚ wasayaḥlifūna billāhi lawis-taṭa`nā lakharajnā ma`akum yuhlikūna anfusahum wallāhu ya`lamu innahum lakādhibūn

ayas.arabic: عَفَا ٱللَّهُ عَنكَ لِمَ أَذِنتَ لَهُمْ حَتَّىٰ يَتَبَيَّنَ لَكَ ٱلَّذِينَ صَدَقُوا۟ وَتَعْلَمَ ٱلْكَـٰذِبِينَ
ayas.translation: Allah forgive thee (O Muhammad)! Wherefor didst thou grant them leave ere those who told the truth were manifest to thee and thou didst know the liars?
ayas.transliteration: `afallāhu `anka lima adhinta lahum ḥattā yatabayyana lakal ladhīna ṣadaqū wata`lamal kādhibīn

ayas.arabic: لَا يَسْتَـْٔذِنُكَ ٱلَّذِينَ يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلْيَوْمِ ٱلْـَٔاخِرِ أَن يُجَـٰهِدُوا۟ بِأَمْوَٰلِهِمْ وَأَنفُسِهِمْ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌۢ بِٱلْمُتَّقِينَ
ayas.translation: Those who believe in Allah and the Last Day ask no leave of thee lest they should strive with their wealth and their lives. Allah is Aware of those who keep their duty (unto Him).
ayas.transliteration: lā yasta-dhinukal ladhīna yu-minūna billāhi wal yawmil-ākhiri an yujāhidū bi-amwālihim wa-anfusihim ۗ wallāhu `alīmun bil muttaqīn

ayas.arabic: إِنَّمَا يَسْتَـْٔذِنُكَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلْيَوْمِ ٱلْـَٔاخِرِ وَٱرْتَابَتْ قُلُوبُهُمْ فَهُمْ فِى رَيْبِهِمْ يَتَرَدَّدُونَ
ayas.translation: They alone ask leave of thee who believe not in Allah and the Last Day, and whose hearts feel doubt, so in their doubt they waver.
ayas.transliteration: innamā yasta-dhinukal ladhīna lā yu-minūna billāhi wal yawmil-ākhiri wartābat qulūbuhum fahum fī raybihim yataraddadūn

ayas.arabic: وَلَوْ أَرَادُوا۟ ٱلْخُرُوجَ لَأَعَدُّوا۟ لَهُۥ عُدَّةً وَلَـٰكِن كَرِهَ ٱللَّهُ ٱنۢبِعَاثَهُمْ فَثَبَّطَهُمْ وَقِيلَ ٱقْعُدُوا۟ مَعَ ٱلْقَـٰعِدِينَ
ayas.translation: And if they had wished to go forth they would assuredly have made ready some equipment, but Allah was averse to their being sent forth and held them back and it was said (unto them): Sit ye with the sedentary!
ayas.transliteration: walaw arādul khurūja la-a`addū lahu `uddatan walākin karihallāhun-bi`āthahum fathabbaṭahum waqīlaq-`udū ma`al qā`idīn

ayas.arabic: لَوْ خَرَجُوا۟ فِيكُم مَّا زَادُوكُمْ إِلَّا خَبَالًا وَلَأَوْضَعُوا۟ خِلَـٰلَكُمْ يَبْغُونَكُمُ ٱلْفِتْنَةَ وَفِيكُمْ سَمَّـٰعُونَ لَهُمْ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌۢ بِٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
ayas.translation: Had they gone forth among you they had added to you naught save trouble and had hurried to and fro among you, seeking to cause sedition among you; and among you there are some who would have listened to them. Allah is Aware of evil-doers.
ayas.transliteration: law kharajū fīkum mā zādūkum illā khabālan wala-awḍa`ū khilālakum yabghūnakumul fitnata wafīkum sammā`ūna lahum ۗ wallāhu `alīmun biẓ ẓālimīn

ayas.arabic: لَقَدِ ٱبْتَغَوُا۟ ٱلْفِتْنَةَ مِن قَبْلُ وَقَلَّبُوا۟ لَكَ ٱلْأُمُورَ حَتَّىٰ جَآءَ ٱلْحَقُّ وَظَهَرَ أَمْرُ ٱللَّهِ وَهُمْ كَـٰرِهُونَ
ayas.translation: Aforetime they sought to cause sedition and raised difficulties for thee till the Truth came and the decree of Allah was made manifest, though they were loth.
ayas.transliteration: laqadib-taghawul fitnata min qablu waqallabū lakal-umūra ḥattā jā-al ḥaqqu waẓahara amrullāhi wahum kārihūn

ayas.arabic: وَمِنْهُم مَّن يَقُولُ ٱئْذَن لِّى وَلَا تَفْتِنِّىٓ ۚ أَلَا فِى ٱلْفِتْنَةِ سَقَطُوا۟ ۗ وَإِنَّ جَهَنَّمَ لَمُحِيطَةٌۢ بِٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
ayas.translation: Of them is he who saith: Grant me leave (to stay at home) and tempt me not. Surely it is into temptation that they (thus) have fallen. Lo! hell verily is all around the disbelievers.
ayas.transliteration: wa minhum man yaqūlu-dhan lī walā taftinnī ۚ alā fil fitnati saqaṭū ۗ wa inna jahannama lamuḥīṭatun bil kāfirīn

ayas.arabic: إِن تُصِبْكَ حَسَنَةٌ تَسُؤْهُمْ ۖ وَإِن تُصِبْكَ مُصِيبَةٌ يَقُولُوا۟ قَدْ أَخَذْنَآ أَمْرَنَا مِن قَبْلُ وَيَتَوَلَّوا۟ وَّهُمْ فَرِحُونَ
ayas.translation: If good befalleth thee (O Muhammad) it afflicteth them, and if calamity befalleth thee, they say: We took precaution, and they turn away well pleased.
ayas.transliteration: in tuṣibka ḥasanatun tasu-hum ۖ wa in tuṣibka muṣībatun yaqūlū qad akhadhnā amranā min qablu wayatawallaw wahum fariḥūn

ayas.arabic: قُل لَّن يُصِيبَنَآ إِلَّا مَا كَتَبَ ٱللَّهُ لَنَا هُوَ مَوْلَىٰنَا ۚ وَعَلَى ٱللَّهِ فَلْيَتَوَكَّلِ ٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ
ayas.translation: Say: Naught befalleth us save that which Allah hath decreed for us. He is our Protecting Friend. In Allah let believers put their trust!
ayas.transliteration: qul lan yuṣībanā illā mā kataballāhu lanā huwa mawlānā ۚ wa`alallāhi falyatawakkalil mu-minūn

ayas.arabic: قُلْ هَلْ تَرَبَّصُونَ بِنَآ إِلَّآ إِحْدَى ٱلْحُسْنَيَيْنِ ۖ وَنَحْنُ نَتَرَبَّصُ بِكُمْ أَن يُصِيبَكُمُ ٱللَّهُ بِعَذَابٍ مِّنْ عِندِهِۦٓ أَوْ بِأَيْدِينَا ۖ فَتَرَبَّصُوٓا۟ إِنَّا مَعَكُم مُّتَرَبِّصُونَ
ayas.translation: Say: Can ye await for us aught save one of two good things (death or victory in Allah's way)? while we await for you that Allah will afflict you with a doom from Him or at our hands. Await then! Lo! We are awaiting with you.
ayas.transliteration: qul hal tarabbaṣūna binā illā iḥdal ḥusnayayn ۖ wanaḥnu natarabbaṣu bikum an yuṣībakumullāhu bi`adhābin min `indihi aw bi-aydīnā ۖ fatarabbaṣū innā ma`akum mutarabbiṣūn

ayas.arabic: قُلْ أَنفِقُوا۟ طَوْعًا أَوْ كَرْهًا لَّن يُتَقَبَّلَ مِنكُمْ ۖ إِنَّكُمْ كُنتُمْ قَوْمًا فَـٰسِقِينَ
ayas.translation: Say: Pay (your contribution), willingly or unwillingly, it will not be accepted from you. Lo! ye were ever froward folk.
ayas.transliteration: qul anfiqū ṭaw`an aw karhal lan yutaqabbala minkum ۖ innakum kuntum qawman fāsiqīn

ayas.arabic: وَمَا مَنَعَهُمْ أَن تُقْبَلَ مِنْهُمْ نَفَقَـٰتُهُمْ إِلَّآ أَنَّهُمْ كَفَرُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَبِرَسُولِهِۦ وَلَا يَأْتُونَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ إِلَّا وَهُمْ كُسَالَىٰ وَلَا يُنفِقُونَ إِلَّا وَهُمْ كَـٰرِهُونَ
ayas.translation: And naught preventeth that their contributions should be accepted from them save that they have disbelieved in Allah and in His messenger, and they come not to worship save as idlers, and pay not (their contribution) save reluctantly.
ayas.transliteration: wa mā mana`ahum an tuqbala minhum nafaqātuhum illā annahum kafarū billāhi wabirasūlihi walā ya-tūnaṣ ṣalāta illā wahum kusālā walā yunfiqūna illā wahum kārihūn

ayas.arabic: فَلَا تُعْجِبْكَ أَمْوَٰلُهُمْ وَلَآ أَوْلَـٰدُهُمْ ۚ إِنَّمَا يُرِيدُ ٱللَّهُ لِيُعَذِّبَهُم بِهَا فِى ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا وَتَزْهَقَ أَنفُسُهُمْ وَهُمْ كَـٰفِرُونَ
ayas.translation: So let not their riches nor their children please thee (O Muhammad). Allah thereby intendeth but to punish them in the life of the world and that their souls shall pass away while they are disbelievers.
ayas.transliteration: falā tu`jibka amwāluhum walā awlāduhum ۚ innamā yurīdullāhu liyu`adhhibahum bihā fil ḥayātid dunyā watazhaqa anfusuhum wahum kāfirūn

ayas.arabic: وَيَحْلِفُونَ بِٱللَّهِ إِنَّهُمْ لَمِنكُمْ وَمَا هُم مِّنكُمْ وَلَـٰكِنَّهُمْ قَوْمٌ يَفْرَقُونَ
ayas.translation: And they swear by Allah that they are in truth of you, when they are not of you, but they are folk who are afraid.
ayas.transliteration: wayaḥlifūna billāhi innahum laminkum wa mā hum minkum walākinnahum qawmun yafraqūn

ayas.arabic: لَوْ يَجِدُونَ مَلْجَـًٔا أَوْ مَغَـٰرَٰتٍ أَوْ مُدَّخَلًا لَّوَلَّوْا۟ إِلَيْهِ وَهُمْ يَجْمَحُونَ
ayas.translation: Had they but found a refuge, or caverns, or a place to enter, they surely had resorted thither swift as runaways.
ayas.transliteration: law yajidūna malja-an aw maghārātin aw muddakhalal lawallaw ilayhi wahum yajmaḥūn

ayas.arabic: وَمِنْهُم مَّن يَلْمِزُكَ فِى ٱلصَّدَقَـٰتِ فَإِنْ أُعْطُوا۟ مِنْهَا رَضُوا۟ وَإِن لَّمْ يُعْطَوْا۟ مِنْهَآ إِذَا هُمْ يَسْخَطُونَ
ayas.translation: And of them is he who defameth thee in the matter of the alms. If they are given thereof they are content, and if they are not given thereof, behold! they are enraged.
ayas.transliteration: wa minhum man yal-mizuka fiṣ ṣadaqāti fa-in u`ṭū minhā raḍū wa in lam yu`ṭaw minhā idhā hum yaskhaṭūn

ayas.arabic: وَلَوْ أَنَّهُمْ رَضُوا۟ مَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ وَرَسُولُهُۥ وَقَالُوا۟ حَسْبُنَا ٱللَّهُ سَيُؤْتِينَا ٱللَّهُ مِن فَضْلِهِۦ وَرَسُولُهُۥٓ إِنَّآ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ رَٰغِبُونَ
ayas.translation: (How much more seemly) had they been content with that which Allah and His messenger had given them and had said: Allah sufficeth us. Allah will give us of His bounty, and (also) His messenger. Unto Allah we are suppliants.
ayas.transliteration: walaw annahum raḍū mā ātāhumullāhu warasūluhu waqālū ḥasbunallāhu sayu-tīnallāhu min faḍlihi warasūluhu innā ilallāhi rāghibūn

ayas.arabic: إِنَّمَا ٱلصَّدَقَـٰتُ لِلْفُقَرَآءِ وَٱلْمَسَـٰكِينِ وَٱلْعَـٰمِلِينَ عَلَيْهَا وَٱلْمُؤَلَّفَةِ قُلُوبُهُمْ وَفِى ٱلرِّقَابِ وَٱلْغَـٰرِمِينَ وَفِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَٱبْنِ ٱلسَّبِيلِ ۖ فَرِيضَةً مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌ
ayas.translation: The alms are only for the poor and the needy, and those who collect them, and those whose hearts are to be reconciled, and to free the captives and the debtors, and for the cause of Allah, and (for) the wayfarer; a duty imposed by Allah. Allah is Knower, Wise.
ayas.transliteration: innamaṣ ṣadaqātu lilfuqarā-i wal masākīni wal `āmilīna `alayhā wal mu-allafati qulūbuhum wafir riqābi wal ghārimīna wafī sabīlillāhi wabnis sabīl ۖ farīḍatan minallāh ۗ wallāhu `alīmun ḥakīm

ayas.arabic: وَمِنْهُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ يُؤْذُونَ ٱلنَّبِىَّ وَيَقُولُونَ هُوَ أُذُنٌ ۚ قُلْ أُذُنُ خَيْرٍ لَّكُمْ يُؤْمِنُ بِٱللَّهِ وَيُؤْمِنُ لِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَرَحْمَةٌ لِّلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مِنكُمْ ۚ وَٱلَّذِينَ يُؤْذُونَ رَسُولَ ٱللَّهِ لَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
ayas.translation: And of them are those who vex the Prophet and say: He is only a hearer. Say: A hearer of good for you, who believeth in Allah and is true to the believers, and a mercy for such of you as believe. Those who vex the messenger of Allah, for them there is a painful doom.
ayas.transliteration: wa minhumul ladhīna yu-dhūnan nabiyya wayaqūlūna huwa udhun ۚ qul udhunu khayrin lakum yu-minu billāhi wayu-minu lil-mu-minīna waraḥmatun lilladhīna āmanū minkum ۚ wal ladhīna yu-dhūna rasūlallāhi lahum `adhābun alīm

ayas.arabic: يَحْلِفُونَ بِٱللَّهِ لَكُمْ لِيُرْضُوكُمْ وَٱللَّهُ وَرَسُولُهُۥٓ أَحَقُّ أَن يُرْضُوهُ إِن كَانُوا۟ مُؤْمِنِينَ
ayas.translation: They swear by Allah to you (Muslims) to please you, but Allah, with His messenger, hath more right that they should please Him if they are believers.
ayas.transliteration: yaḥlifūna billāhi lakum liyurḍūkum wallāhu warasūluhu aḥaqqu an yurḍūhu in kānū mu-minīn

ayas.arabic: أَلَمْ يَعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّهُۥ مَن يُحَادِدِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ فَأَنَّ لَهُۥ نَارَ جَهَنَّمَ خَـٰلِدًا فِيهَا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْخِزْىُ ٱلْعَظِيمُ
ayas.translation: Know they not that whoso opposeth Allah and His messenger, his verily is fire of hell, to abide therein? That is the extreme abasement.
ayas.transliteration: alam ya`lamū annahu man yuḥādidillāha warasūlahu fa-anna lahu nāra jahannama khālidan fīhā ۚ dhālikal khizyul `aẓīm

ayas.arabic: يَحْذَرُ ٱلْمُنَـٰفِقُونَ أَن تُنَزَّلَ عَلَيْهِمْ سُورَةٌ تُنَبِّئُهُم بِمَا فِى قُلُوبِهِمْ ۚ قُلِ ٱسْتَهْزِءُوٓا۟ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ مُخْرِجٌ مَّا تَحْذَرُونَ
ayas.translation: The hypocrites fear lest a surah should be revealed concerning them, proclaiming what is in their hearts. Say: Scoff (your fill)! Lo! Allah is disclosing what ye fear.
ayas.transliteration: yaḥdharul munāfiqūna an tunazzala `alayhim sūratun tunabbi-uhum bimā fī qulūbihim ۚ qulis-tahzi-ū innallāha mukhrijun mā taḥdharūn

ayas.arabic: وَلَئِن سَأَلْتَهُمْ لَيَقُولُنَّ إِنَّمَا كُنَّا نَخُوضُ وَنَلْعَبُ ۚ قُلْ أَبِٱللَّهِ وَءَايَـٰتِهِۦ وَرَسُولِهِۦ كُنتُمْ تَسْتَهْزِءُونَ
ayas.translation: And if thou ask them (O Muhammad) they will say: We did but talk and jest. Say: Was it at Allah and His revelations and His messenger that ye did scoff?
ayas.transliteration: wala-in sa-altahum layaqūlunna innamā kunnā nakhūḍu wanal`ab ۚ qul abillāhi wa-āyātihi warasūlihi kuntum tastahzi-ūn

ayas.arabic: لَا تَعْتَذِرُوا۟ قَدْ كَفَرْتُم بَعْدَ إِيمَـٰنِكُمْ ۚ إِن نَّعْفُ عَن طَآئِفَةٍ مِّنكُمْ نُعَذِّبْ طَآئِفَةًۢ بِأَنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ مُجْرِمِينَ
ayas.translation: Make no excuse. Ye have disbelieved after your (confession of) belief. If We forgive a party of you, a party of you We shall punish because they have been guilty.
ayas.transliteration: lā ta`tadhirū qad kafartum ba`da-iymānikum ۚ in na`fu `an ṭā-ifatim minkum nu`adhhib ṭā-ifatan bi-annahum kānū mujrimīn

ayas.arabic: ٱلْمُنَـٰفِقُونَ وَٱلْمُنَـٰفِقَـٰتُ بَعْضُهُم مِّنۢ بَعْضٍ ۚ يَأْمُرُونَ بِٱلْمُنكَرِ وَيَنْهَوْنَ عَنِ ٱلْمَعْرُوفِ وَيَقْبِضُونَ أَيْدِيَهُمْ ۚ نَسُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ فَنَسِيَهُمْ ۗ إِنَّ ٱلْمُنَـٰفِقِينَ هُمُ ٱلْفَـٰسِقُونَ
ayas.translation: The hypocrites, both men and women, proceed one from another. They enjoin the wrong, and they forbid the right, and they withhold their hands (from spending for the cause of Allah). They forget Allah, so He hath forgotten them. Lo! the hypocrites, they are the transgressors.
ayas.transliteration: al-munāfiqūna wal munāfiqātu ba`ḍuhum min ba`ḍ ۚ ya-murūna bil munkari wayanhawna `anil ma`rūfi wayaqbiḍūna aydiyahum ۚ nasullāha fanasiyahum ۗ innal munāfiqīna humul fāsiqūn

ayas.arabic: وَعَدَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْمُنَـٰفِقِينَ وَٱلْمُنَـٰفِقَـٰتِ وَٱلْكُفَّارَ نَارَ جَهَنَّمَ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا ۚ هِىَ حَسْبُهُمْ ۚ وَلَعَنَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ ۖ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌ مُّقِيمٌ
ayas.translation: Allah promiseth the hypocrites, both men and women, and the disbelievers fire of hell for their abode. It will suffice them. Allah curseth them, and theirs is lasting torment.
ayas.transliteration: wa`adallāhul munāfiqīna wal munāfiqāti wal kuffāra nāra jahannama khālidīna fīhā ۚ hiya ḥasbuhum ۚ wala`anahumullāh ۖ walahum `adhābun muqīm

ayas.arabic: كَٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِكُمْ كَانُوٓا۟ أَشَدَّ مِنكُمْ قُوَّةً وَأَكْثَرَ أَمْوَٰلًا وَأَوْلَـٰدًا فَٱسْتَمْتَعُوا۟ بِخَلَـٰقِهِمْ فَٱسْتَمْتَعْتُم بِخَلَـٰقِكُمْ كَمَا ٱسْتَمْتَعَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِكُم بِخَلَـٰقِهِمْ وَخُضْتُمْ كَٱلَّذِى خَاضُوٓا۟ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ حَبِطَتْ أَعْمَـٰلُهُمْ فِى ٱلدُّنْيَا وَٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ ۖ وَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْخَـٰسِرُونَ
ayas.translation: Even as those before you who were mightier than you in strength, and more affluent than you in wealth and children. They enjoyed their lot awhile, so ye enjoy your lot awhile even as those before you did enjoy their lot awhile. And ye prate even as they prated. Such are they whose works have perished in the world and the Hereafter. Such are they who are the losers.
ayas.transliteration: kal ladhīna min qablikum kānū ashadda minkum quwwatan wa-akthara amwālan wa-awlādan fastamta`ū bikhalāqihim fastamta`tum bikhalāqikum kamas-tamta`al ladhīna min qablikum bikhalāqihim wakhuḍtum kal ladhī khāḍū ۚ ulā-ika ḥabiṭat a`māluhum fid dunyā wal-ākhirah ۖ wa-ulā-ika humul khāsirūn

ayas.arabic: أَلَمْ يَأْتِهِمْ نَبَأُ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ قَوْمِ نُوحٍ وَعَادٍ وَثَمُودَ وَقَوْمِ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ وَأَصْحَـٰبِ مَدْيَنَ وَٱلْمُؤْتَفِكَـٰتِ ۚ أَتَتْهُمْ رُسُلُهُم بِٱلْبَيِّنَـٰتِ ۖ فَمَا كَانَ ٱللَّهُ لِيَظْلِمَهُمْ وَلَـٰكِن كَانُوٓا۟ أَنفُسَهُمْ يَظْلِمُونَ
ayas.translation: Hath not the fame of those before them reached them - the folk of Noah, A'ad, Thamud, the folk of Abraham, the dwellers of Midian and the disasters (which befell them)? Their messengers (from Allah) came unto them with proofs (of Allah's Sovereignty). So Allah surely wronged them not, but they did wrong themselves.
ayas.transliteration: alam ya-tihim naba-ul ladhīna min qablihim qawmi nūḥin wa`ādin wathamūda waqawmi ibrāhīma wa-aṣ-ḥābi madyana wal mu-tafikāt ۚ atat-hum rusuluhum bil bayyināt ۖ famā kānallāhu liyaẓlimahum walākin kānū anfusahum yaẓlimūn

ayas.arabic: وَٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنَـٰتُ بَعْضُهُمْ أَوْلِيَآءُ بَعْضٍ ۚ يَأْمُرُونَ بِٱلْمَعْرُوفِ وَيَنْهَوْنَ عَنِ ٱلْمُنكَرِ وَيُقِيمُونَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَيُؤْتُونَ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَيُطِيعُونَ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥٓ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ سَيَرْحَمُهُمُ ٱللَّهُ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٌ
ayas.translation: And the believers, men and women, are protecting friends one of another; they enjoin the right and forbid the wrong, and they establish worship and they pay the poor-due, and they obey Allah and His messenger. As for these, Allah will have mercy on them. Lo! Allah is Mighty, Wise.
ayas.transliteration: wal mu-minūna wal mu-minātu ba`ḍuhum awliyā-u ba`ḍ ۚ ya-murūna bil ma`rūfi wayanhawna `anil munkari wayuqīmūnaṣ ṣalāta wayu-tūnaz zakāta wayuṭī`ūnallāha warasūlah ۚ ulā-ika sayarḥamuhumullāh ۗ innallāha `azīzun ḥakīm

ayas.arabic: وَعَدَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنَـٰتِ جَنَّـٰتٍ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا وَمَسَـٰكِنَ طَيِّبَةً فِى جَنَّـٰتِ عَدْنٍ ۚ وَرِضْوَٰنٌ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ أَكْبَرُ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْعَظِيمُ
ayas.translation: Allah promiseth to the believers, men and women, Gardens underneath which rivers flow, wherein they will abide - blessed dwellings in Gardens of Eden. And - greater (far)! - acceptance from Allah. That is the supreme triumph.
ayas.transliteration: wa`adallāhul mu-minīna wal mu-mināti jannātin tajrī min taḥtihal-anhāru khālidīna fīhā wa masākina ṭayyibatan fī jannāti `adn ۚ wariḍwānun minallāhi akbar ۚ dhālika huwal fawzul `aẓīm

ayas.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِىُّ جَـٰهِدِ ٱلْكُفَّارَ وَٱلْمُنَـٰفِقِينَ وَٱغْلُظْ عَلَيْهِمْ ۚ وَمَأْوَىٰهُمْ جَهَنَّمُ ۖ وَبِئْسَ ٱلْمَصِيرُ
ayas.translation: O Prophet! Strive against the disbelievers and the hypocrites! Be harsh with them. Their ultimate abode is hell, a hapless journey's end.
ayas.transliteration: yā-ayyuhan nabiyyu jāhidil kuffāra wal munāfiqīna waghluẓ `alayhim ۚ wa ma-wāhum jahannam ۖ wabi-sal maṣīr

ayas.arabic: يَحْلِفُونَ بِٱللَّهِ مَا قَالُوا۟ وَلَقَدْ قَالُوا۟ كَلِمَةَ ٱلْكُفْرِ وَكَفَرُوا۟ بَعْدَ إِسْلَـٰمِهِمْ وَهَمُّوا۟ بِمَا لَمْ يَنَالُوا۟ ۚ وَمَا نَقَمُوٓا۟ إِلَّآ أَنْ أَغْنَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ وَرَسُولُهُۥ مِن فَضْلِهِۦ ۚ فَإِن يَتُوبُوا۟ يَكُ خَيْرًا لَّهُمْ ۖ وَإِن يَتَوَلَّوْا۟ يُعَذِّبْهُمُ ٱللَّهُ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًا فِى ٱلدُّنْيَا وَٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ ۚ وَمَا لَهُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ مِن وَلِىٍّ وَلَا نَصِيرٍ
ayas.translation: They swear by Allah that they said nothing (wrong), yet they did say the word of disbelief, and did disbelieve after their Surrender (to Allah). And they purposed that which they could not attain, and they sought revenge only that Allah by His messenger should enrich them of His bounty. If they repent it will be better for them; and if they turn away, Allah will afflict them with a painful doom in the world and the Hereafter, and they have no protecting friend nor helper in the earth.
ayas.transliteration: yaḥlifūna billāhi mā qālū walaqad qālū kalimatal kufri wakafarū ba`da islāmihim wahammū bimā lam yanālū ۚ wa mā naqamū illā an aghnāhumullāhu warasūluhu min faḍlih ۚ fa-in yatūbū yaku khayral lahum ۖ wa in yatawallaw yu`adhhibhumullāhu `adhāban alīman fid dunyā wal-ākhirah ۚ wa mā lahum fil-arḍi min waliyyin walā naṣīr

ayas.arabic: وَمِنْهُم مَّنْ عَـٰهَدَ ٱللَّهَ لَئِنْ ءَاتَىٰنَا مِن فَضْلِهِۦ لَنَصَّدَّقَنَّ وَلَنَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ
ayas.translation: And of them is he who made a covenant with Allah (saying): If He give us of His bounty we will give alms and become of the righteous.
ayas.transliteration: wa minhum man `āhadallāha la-in ātānā min faḍlihi lanaṣṣaddaqanna walanakūnanna minaṣ ṣāliḥīn

ayas.arabic: فَلَمَّآ ءَاتَىٰهُم مِّن فَضْلِهِۦ بَخِلُوا۟ بِهِۦ وَتَوَلَّوا۟ وَّهُم مُّعْرِضُونَ
ayas.translation: Yet when He gave them of His bounty, they hoarded it and turned away, averse;
ayas.transliteration: falammā ātāhum min faḍlihi bakhilū bihi watawallaw wahum mu`riḍūn

ayas.arabic: فَأَعْقَبَهُمْ نِفَاقًا فِى قُلُوبِهِمْ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ يَلْقَوْنَهُۥ بِمَآ أَخْلَفُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مَا وَعَدُوهُ وَبِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَكْذِبُونَ
ayas.translation: So He hath made the consequence (to be) hypocrisy in their hearts until the day when they shall meet Him, because they broke their word to Allah that they promised Him, and because they lied.
ayas.transliteration: fa-a`qabahum nifāqan fī qulūbihim ilā yawmi yalqawnahu bimā akhlafullāha mā wa`adūhu wabimā kānū yakdhibūn

ayas.arabic: أَلَمْ يَعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعْلَمُ سِرَّهُمْ وَنَجْوَىٰهُمْ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلَّـٰمُ ٱلْغُيُوبِ
ayas.translation: Know they not that Allah knoweth both their secret and the thought that they confide, and that Allah is the Knower of Things Hidden?
ayas.transliteration: alam ya`lamū annallāha ya`lamu sirrahum wanajwāhum wa-annallāha `allāmul ghuyūb

ayas.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَلْمِزُونَ ٱلْمُطَّوِّعِينَ مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ فِى ٱلصَّدَقَـٰتِ وَٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَجِدُونَ إِلَّا جُهْدَهُمْ فَيَسْخَرُونَ مِنْهُمْ ۙ سَخِرَ ٱللَّهُ مِنْهُمْ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
ayas.translation: Those who point at such of the believers as give the alms willingly and such as can find naught to give but their endeavours, and deride them - Allah (Himself) derideth them. Theirs will be a painful doom.
ayas.transliteration: alladhīna yal-mizūnal muṭṭawwi`īna minal mu-minīna fiṣ ṣadaqāti wal ladhīna lā yajidūna illā juhdahum fayaskharūna minhum sakhirallāhu minhum walahum `adhābun alīm

ayas.arabic: ٱسْتَغْفِرْ لَهُمْ أَوْ لَا تَسْتَغْفِرْ لَهُمْ إِن تَسْتَغْفِرْ لَهُمْ سَبْعِينَ مَرَّةً فَلَن يَغْفِرَ ٱللَّهُ لَهُمْ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمْ كَفَرُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يَهْدِى ٱلْقَوْمَ ٱلْفَـٰسِقِينَ
ayas.translation: Ask forgiveness for them (O Muhammad), or ask not forgiveness for them; though thou ask forgiveness for them seventy times Allah will not forgive them. That is because they disbelieved in Allah and His messenger, and Allah guideth not wrongdoing folk.
ayas.transliteration: is-taghfir lahum aw lā tastaghfir lahum in tastaghfir lahum sab`īna marratan falan yaghfirallāhu lahum ۚ dhālika bi-annahum kafarū billāhi warasūlih ۗ wallāhu lā yahdil qawmal fāsiqīn

ayas.arabic: فَرِحَ ٱلْمُخَلَّفُونَ بِمَقْعَدِهِمْ خِلَـٰفَ رَسُولِ ٱللَّهِ وَكَرِهُوٓا۟ أَن يُجَـٰهِدُوا۟ بِأَمْوَٰلِهِمْ وَأَنفُسِهِمْ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَقَالُوا۟ لَا تَنفِرُوا۟ فِى ٱلْحَرِّ ۗ قُلْ نَارُ جَهَنَّمَ أَشَدُّ حَرًّا ۚ لَّوْ كَانُوا۟ يَفْقَهُونَ
ayas.translation: Those who were left behind rejoiced at sitting still behind the messenger of Allah, and were averse to striving with their wealth and their lives in Allah's way. And they said: Go not forth in the heat! Say: The fire of hell is more intense of heat, if they but understood.
ayas.transliteration: fariḥal mukhallafūna bimaq`adihim khilāfa rasūlillāhi wakarihū an yujāhidū bi-amwālihim wa-anfusihim fī sabīlillāhi waqālū lā tanfirū fil ḥarr ۗ qul nāru jahannama ashaddu ḥarrā ۚ law kānū yafqahūn

ayas.arabic: فَلْيَضْحَكُوا۟ قَلِيلًا وَلْيَبْكُوا۟ كَثِيرًا جَزَآءًۢ بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَكْسِبُونَ
ayas.translation: Then let them laugh a little: they will weep much, as the reward of what they used to earn.
ayas.transliteration: falyaḍ-ḥakū qalīlan walyabkū kathīran jazā-an bimā kānū yaksibūn

ayas.arabic: فَإِن رَّجَعَكَ ٱللَّهُ إِلَىٰ طَآئِفَةٍ مِّنْهُمْ فَٱسْتَـْٔذَنُوكَ لِلْخُرُوجِ فَقُل لَّن تَخْرُجُوا۟ مَعِىَ أَبَدًا وَلَن تُقَـٰتِلُوا۟ مَعِىَ عَدُوًّا ۖ إِنَّكُمْ رَضِيتُم بِٱلْقُعُودِ أَوَّلَ مَرَّةٍ فَٱقْعُدُوا۟ مَعَ ٱلْخَـٰلِفِينَ
ayas.translation: If Allah bring thee back (from the campaign) unto a party of them and they ask of thee leave to go out (to fight), then say unto them: Ye shall never more go out with me nor fight with me against a foe. Ye were content with sitting still the first time. So sit still, with the useless.
ayas.transliteration: fa-in raja`akallāhu ilā ṭā-ifatim minhum fasta-dhanūka lilkhurūji faqul lan takhrujū ma`iya abadan walan tuqātilū ma`iya `aduwwā ۖ innakum raḍītum bil qu`ūdi awwala marratin faq`udū ma`al khālifīn

ayas.arabic: وَلَا تُصَلِّ عَلَىٰٓ أَحَدٍ مِّنْهُم مَّاتَ أَبَدًا وَلَا تَقُمْ عَلَىٰ قَبْرِهِۦٓ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ كَفَرُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ وَمَاتُوا۟ وَهُمْ فَـٰسِقُونَ
ayas.translation: And never (O Muhammad) pray for one of them who dieth, nor stand by his grave. Lo! they disbelieved in Allah and His messenger, and they died while they were evil-doers.
ayas.transliteration: walā tuṣalli `alā aḥadin minhum māta abadan walā taqum `alā qabrih ۖ innahum kafarū billāhi warasūlihi wa mātū wahum fāsiqūn

ayas.arabic: وَلَا تُعْجِبْكَ أَمْوَٰلُهُمْ وَأَوْلَـٰدُهُمْ ۚ إِنَّمَا يُرِيدُ ٱللَّهُ أَن يُعَذِّبَهُم بِهَا فِى ٱلدُّنْيَا وَتَزْهَقَ أَنفُسُهُمْ وَهُمْ كَـٰفِرُونَ
ayas.translation: Let not their wealth nor their children please thee! Allah purposeth only to punish them thereby in the world, and that their souls shall pass away while they are disbelievers.
ayas.transliteration: walā tu`jibka amwāluhum wa-awlāduhum ۚ innamā yurīdullāhu an yu`adhhibahum bihā fid dunyā watazhaqa anfusuhum wahum kāfirūn

ayas.arabic: وَإِذَآ أُنزِلَتْ سُورَةٌ أَنْ ءَامِنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَجَـٰهِدُوا۟ مَعَ رَسُولِهِ ٱسْتَـْٔذَنَكَ أُو۟لُوا۟ ٱلطَّوْلِ مِنْهُمْ وَقَالُوا۟ ذَرْنَا نَكُن مَّعَ ٱلْقَـٰعِدِينَ
ayas.translation: And when a surah is revealed (which saith): Believe in Allah and strive along with His messenger, the men of wealth among them still ask leave of thee and say: Suffer us to be with those who sit (at home).
ayas.transliteration: wa idhā unzilat sūratun an āminū billāhi wajāhidū ma`a rasūlihis-ta-dhanaka uluṭ ṭawli minhum waqālū dharnā nakun ma`al qā`idīn

ayas.arabic: رَضُوا۟ بِأَن يَكُونُوا۟ مَعَ ٱلْخَوَالِفِ وَطُبِعَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمْ فَهُمْ لَا يَفْقَهُونَ
ayas.translation: They are content that they should be with the useless and their hearts are sealed, so that they apprehend not.
ayas.transliteration: raḍū bi-an yakūnū ma`al khawālifi waṭubi`a `alā qulūbihim fahum lā yafqahūn

ayas.arabic: لَـٰكِنِ ٱلرَّسُولُ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مَعَهُۥ جَـٰهَدُوا۟ بِأَمْوَٰلِهِمْ وَأَنفُسِهِمْ ۚ وَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ لَهُمُ ٱلْخَيْرَٰتُ ۖ وَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْمُفْلِحُونَ
ayas.translation: But the messenger and those who believe with him strive with their wealth and their lives. Such are they for whom are the good things. Such are they who are the successful.
ayas.transliteration: lākinir rasūlu wal ladhīna āmanū ma`ahu jāhadū bi-amwālihim wa-anfusihim ۚ wa-ulā-ika lahumul khayrāt ۖ wa-ulā-ika humul mufliḥūn

ayas.arabic: أَعَدَّ ٱللَّهُ لَهُمْ جَنَّـٰتٍ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْعَظِيمُ
ayas.translation: Allah hath made ready for them Gardens underneath which rivers flow, wherein they will abide. That is the supreme triumph.
ayas.transliteration: a`addallāhu lahum jannātin tajrī min taḥtihal-anhāru khālidīna fīhā ۚ dhālikal fawzul `aẓīm

ayas.arabic: وَجَآءَ ٱلْمُعَذِّرُونَ مِنَ ٱلْأَعْرَابِ لِيُؤْذَنَ لَهُمْ وَقَعَدَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَبُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ ۚ سَيُصِيبُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِنْهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
ayas.translation: And those among the wandering Arabs who had an excuse came in order that permission might be granted them. And those who lied to Allah and His messenger sat at home. A painful doom will fall on those of them who disbelieve.
ayas.transliteration: wajā-al mu`adhhirūna minal-a`rābi liyu-dhana lahum waqa`adal ladhīna kadhabullāha warasūlah ۚ sayuṣībul ladhīna kafarū minhum `adhābun alīm

ayas.arabic: لَّيْسَ عَلَى ٱلضُّعَفَآءِ وَلَا عَلَى ٱلْمَرْضَىٰ وَلَا عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَجِدُونَ مَا يُنفِقُونَ حَرَجٌ إِذَا نَصَحُوا۟ لِلَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ ۚ مَا عَلَى ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ مِن سَبِيلٍ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ
ayas.translation: Not unto the weak nor unto the sick nor unto those who can find naught to spend is any fault (to be imputed though they stay at home) if they are true to Allah and His messenger. Not unto the good is there any road (of blame). Allah is Forgiving, Merciful.
ayas.transliteration: laysa `alaḍ ḍu`afā-i walā `alal-marḍā walā `alal ladhīna lā yajidūna mā yunfiqūna ḥarajun idhā naṣaḥū lillāhi warasūlih ۚ mā `alal-muḥsinīna min sabīl ۚ wallāhu ghafūrun raḥīm

ayas.arabic: وَلَا عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا مَآ أَتَوْكَ لِتَحْمِلَهُمْ قُلْتَ لَآ أَجِدُ مَآ أَحْمِلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ تَوَلَّوا۟ وَّأَعْيُنُهُمْ تَفِيضُ مِنَ ٱلدَّمْعِ حَزَنًا أَلَّا يَجِدُوا۟ مَا يُنفِقُونَ
ayas.translation: Nor unto those whom, when they came to thee (asking) that thou shouldst mount them, thou didst tell: I cannot find whereon to mount you. They turned back with eyes flowing with tears, for sorrow that they could not find the means to spend.
ayas.transliteration: walā `alal ladhīna idhā mā atawka litaḥmilahum qulta lā ajidu mā aḥmilukum `alayhi tawallaw wa-a`yunuhum tafīḍu minad dam`i ḥazanan allā yajidū mā yunfiqūn

ayas.arabic: إِنَّمَا ٱلسَّبِيلُ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ يَسْتَـْٔذِنُونَكَ وَهُمْ أَغْنِيَآءُ ۚ رَضُوا۟ بِأَن يَكُونُوا۟ مَعَ ٱلْخَوَالِفِ وَطَبَعَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمْ فَهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
ayas.translation: The road (of blame) is only against those who ask for leave of thee (to stay at home) when they are rich. They are content to be with the useless. Allah hath sealed their hearts so that they know not.
ayas.transliteration: innamas sabīlu `alal ladhīna yasta-dhinūnaka wahum aghniyā-u ۚ raḍū bi-an yakūnū ma`al khawālifi waṭaba`allāhu `alā qulūbihim fahum lā ya`lamūn

ayas.arabic: يَعْتَذِرُونَ إِلَيْكُمْ إِذَا رَجَعْتُمْ إِلَيْهِمْ ۚ قُل لَّا تَعْتَذِرُوا۟ لَن نُّؤْمِنَ لَكُمْ قَدْ نَبَّأَنَا ٱللَّهُ مِنْ أَخْبَارِكُمْ ۚ وَسَيَرَى ٱللَّهُ عَمَلَكُمْ وَرَسُولُهُۥ ثُمَّ تُرَدُّونَ إِلَىٰ عَـٰلِمِ ٱلْغَيْبِ وَٱلشَّهَـٰدَةِ فَيُنَبِّئُكُم بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
ayas.translation: They will make excuse to you (Muslims) when ye return unto them. Say: Make no excuse, for we shall not believe you. Allah hath told us tidings of you. Allah and His messenger will see your conduct, and then ye will be brought back unto Him Who knoweth the Invisible as well as the Visible, and He will tell you what ye used to do.
ayas.transliteration: ya`tadhirūna ilaykum idhā raja`tum ilayhim ۚ qul lā ta`tadhirū lan nu-mina lakum qad nabba-anallāhu min akhbārikum ۚ wasayarallāhu `amalakum warasūluhu thumma turaddūna ilā `ālimil ghaybi wash shahādati fayunabbi-ukum bimā kuntum ta`malūn

ayas.arabic: سَيَحْلِفُونَ بِٱللَّهِ لَكُمْ إِذَا ٱنقَلَبْتُمْ إِلَيْهِمْ لِتُعْرِضُوا۟ عَنْهُمْ ۖ فَأَعْرِضُوا۟ عَنْهُمْ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ رِجْسٌ ۖ وَمَأْوَىٰهُمْ جَهَنَّمُ جَزَآءًۢ بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَكْسِبُونَ
ayas.translation: They will swear by Allah unto you, when ye return unto them, that ye may let them be. Let them be, for lo! they are unclean, and their abode is hell as the reward for what they used to earn.
ayas.transliteration: sayaḥlifūna billāhi lakum idhan-qalabtum ilayhim litu`riḍū `anhum ۖ fa-a`riḍū `anhum ۖ innahum rijs ۖ wa ma-wāhum jahannamu jazā-an bimā kānū yaksibūn

ayas.arabic: يَحْلِفُونَ لَكُمْ لِتَرْضَوْا۟ عَنْهُمْ ۖ فَإِن تَرْضَوْا۟ عَنْهُمْ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَرْضَىٰ عَنِ ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلْفَـٰسِقِينَ
ayas.translation: They swear unto you, that ye may accept them. Though ye accept them. Allah verily accepteth not wrongdoing folk.
ayas.transliteration: yaḥlifūna lakum litarḍaw `anhum ۖ fa-in tarḍaw `anhum fa-innallāha lā yarḍā `anil qawmil fāsiqīn

ayas.arabic: ٱلْأَعْرَابُ أَشَدُّ كُفْرًا وَنِفَاقًا وَأَجْدَرُ أَلَّا يَعْلَمُوا۟ حُدُودَ مَآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ رَسُولِهِۦ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌ
ayas.translation: The wandering Arabs are more hard in disbelief and hypocrisy, and more likely to be ignorant of the limits which Allah hath revealed unto His messenger. And Allah is Knower, Wise.
ayas.transliteration: al-a`rābu ashaddu kufran wanifāqan wa-ajdaru allā ya`lamū ḥudūda mā anzalallāhu `alā rasūlih ۗ wallāhu `alīmun ḥakīm

ayas.arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلْأَعْرَابِ مَن يَتَّخِذُ مَا يُنفِقُ مَغْرَمًا وَيَتَرَبَّصُ بِكُمُ ٱلدَّوَآئِرَ ۚ عَلَيْهِمْ دَآئِرَةُ ٱلسَّوْءِ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌ
ayas.translation: And of the wandering Arabs there is he who taketh that which he expendeth (for the cause of Allah) as a loss, and awaiteth (evil) turns of fortune for you (that he may be rid of it). The evil turn of fortune will be theirs. Allah is Hearer, Knower.
ayas.transliteration: wa minal-a`rābi man yattakhidhu mā yunfiqu maghraman wayatarabbaṣu bikumud dawā-ir ۚ `alayhim dā-iratus saw-i ۗ wallāhu samī`un `alīm

ayas.arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلْأَعْرَابِ مَن يُؤْمِنُ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلْيَوْمِ ٱلْـَٔاخِرِ وَيَتَّخِذُ مَا يُنفِقُ قُرُبَـٰتٍ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ وَصَلَوَٰتِ ٱلرَّسُولِ ۚ أَلَآ إِنَّهَا قُرْبَةٌ لَّهُمْ ۚ سَيُدْخِلُهُمُ ٱللَّهُ فِى رَحْمَتِهِۦٓ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ
ayas.translation: And of the wandering Arabs there is he who believeth in Allah and the Last Day, and taketh that which he expendeth and also the prayers of the messenger as acceptable offerings in the sight of Allah. Lo! verily it is an acceptable offering for them. Allah will bring them into His mercy. Lo! Allah is Forgiving, Merciful.
ayas.transliteration: wa minal-a`rābi man yu-minu billāhi wal yawmil-ākhiri wayattakhidhu mā yunfiqu qurubātin `indallāhi waṣalawātir rasūl ۚ alā innahā qurbatun lahum ۚ sayudkhiluhumullāhu fī raḥmatih ۗ innallāha ghafūrun raḥīm

ayas.arabic: وَٱلسَّـٰبِقُونَ ٱلْأَوَّلُونَ مِنَ ٱلْمُهَـٰجِرِينَ وَٱلْأَنصَارِ وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّبَعُوهُم بِإِحْسَـٰنٍ رَّضِىَ ٱللَّهُ عَنْهُمْ وَرَضُوا۟ عَنْهُ وَأَعَدَّ لَهُمْ جَنَّـٰتٍ تَجْرِى تَحْتَهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدًا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْعَظِيمُ
ayas.translation: And the first to lead the way, of the Muhajirin and the Ansar, and those who followed them in goodness - Allah is well pleased with them and they are well pleased with Him, and He hath made ready for them Gardens underneath which rivers flow, wherein they will abide for ever. That is the supreme triumph.
ayas.transliteration: was sābiqūnal-awwalūna minal muhājirīna wal-anṣāri wal ladhīnat-taba`ūhum bi-iḥsānin raḍiyallāhu `anhum waraḍū `anhu wa-a`adda lahum jannātin tajrī taḥtahal-anhāru khālidīna fīhā abadā ۚ dhālikal fawzul `aẓīm

ayas.arabic: وَمِمَّنْ حَوْلَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَعْرَابِ مُنَـٰفِقُونَ ۖ وَمِنْ أَهْلِ ٱلْمَدِينَةِ ۖ مَرَدُوا۟ عَلَى ٱلنِّفَاقِ لَا تَعْلَمُهُمْ ۖ نَحْنُ نَعْلَمُهُمْ ۚ سَنُعَذِّبُهُم مَّرَّتَيْنِ ثُمَّ يُرَدُّونَ إِلَىٰ عَذَابٍ عَظِيمٍ
ayas.translation: And among those around you of the wandering Arabs there are hypocrites, and among the townspeople of Al-Madinah (there are some who) persist in hypocrisy whom thou (O Muhammad) knowest not. We, We know them, and We shall chastise them twice; then they will be relegated to a painful doom.
ayas.transliteration: wa mimman ḥawlakum minal-a`rābi munāfiqūn ۖ wa min ahlil madīnah ۖ maradū `alan nifāqi lā ta`lamuhum ۖ naḥnu na`lamuhum ۚ sanu`adhhibuhum marratayni thumma yuraddūna ilā `adhābin `aẓīm

ayas.arabic: وَءَاخَرُونَ ٱعْتَرَفُوا۟ بِذُنُوبِهِمْ خَلَطُوا۟ عَمَلًا صَـٰلِحًا وَءَاخَرَ سَيِّئًا عَسَى ٱللَّهُ أَن يَتُوبَ عَلَيْهِمْ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ
ayas.translation: And (there are) others who have acknowledged their faults. They mixed a righteous action with another that was bad. It may be that Allah will relent toward them. Lo! Allah is Forgiving, Merciful.
ayas.transliteration: wa-ākharūna'-tarafū bidhunūbihim khalaṭū `amalan ṣāliḥan wa-ākhara sayyi-an `asallāhu an yatūba `alayhim ۚ innallāha ghafūrun raḥīm

ayas.arabic: خُذْ مِنْ أَمْوَٰلِهِمْ صَدَقَةً تُطَهِّرُهُمْ وَتُزَكِّيهِم بِهَا وَصَلِّ عَلَيْهِمْ ۖ إِنَّ صَلَوٰتَكَ سَكَنٌ لَّهُمْ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌ
ayas.translation: Take alms of their wealth, wherewith thou mayst purify them and mayst make them grow, and pray for them. Lo! thy prayer is an assuagement for them. Allah is Hearer, Knower.
ayas.transliteration: khudh min amwālihim ṣadaqatan tuṭahhiruhum watuzakkīhim bihā waṣalli `alayhim ۖ inna ṣalātaka sakanul lahum ۗ wallāhu samī`un `alīm

ayas.arabic: أَلَمْ يَعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ يَقْبَلُ ٱلتَّوْبَةَ عَنْ عِبَادِهِۦ وَيَأْخُذُ ٱلصَّدَقَـٰتِ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلتَّوَّابُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
ayas.translation: Know they not that Allah is He Who accepteth repentance from His bondmen and taketh the alms, and that Allah is He Who is the Relenting, the Merciful.
ayas.transliteration: alam ya`lamū annallāha huwa yaqbalut tawbata `an `ibādihi waya-khudhuṣ ṣadaqāti wa-annallāha huwat tawwābur raḥīm

ayas.arabic: وَقُلِ ٱعْمَلُوا۟ فَسَيَرَى ٱللَّهُ عَمَلَكُمْ وَرَسُولُهُۥ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ ۖ وَسَتُرَدُّونَ إِلَىٰ عَـٰلِمِ ٱلْغَيْبِ وَٱلشَّهَـٰدَةِ فَيُنَبِّئُكُم بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
ayas.translation: And say (unto them): Act! Allah will behold your actions, and (so will) His messenger and the believers, and ye will be brought back to the Knower of the Invisible and the Visible, and He will tell you what ye used to do.
ayas.transliteration: waquli'-malū fasayarallāhu `amalakum warasūluhu wal mu-minūn ۖ wasaturaddūna ilā `ālimil ghaybi wash shahādati fayunabbi-ukum bimā kuntum ta`malūn

ayas.arabic: وَءَاخَرُونَ مُرْجَوْنَ لِأَمْرِ ٱللَّهِ إِمَّا يُعَذِّبُهُمْ وَإِمَّا يَتُوبُ عَلَيْهِمْ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌ
ayas.translation: And (there are) others who await Allah's decree, whether He will punish them or will forgive them. Allah is Knower, Wise.
ayas.transliteration: wa-ākharūna murjawna li-amrillāhi immā yu`adhhibuhum wa immā yatūbu `alayhim ۗ wallāhu `alīmun ḥakīm

ayas.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّخَذُوا۟ مَسْجِدًا ضِرَارًا وَكُفْرًا وَتَفْرِيقًۢا بَيْنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَإِرْصَادًا لِّمَنْ حَارَبَ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ مِن قَبْلُ ۚ وَلَيَحْلِفُنَّ إِنْ أَرَدْنَآ إِلَّا ٱلْحُسْنَىٰ ۖ وَٱللَّهُ يَشْهَدُ إِنَّهُمْ لَكَـٰذِبُونَ
ayas.translation: And as for those who chose a place of worship out of opposition and disbelief, and in order to cause dissent among the believers, and as an outpost for those who warred against Allah and His messenger aforetime, they will surely swear: We purposed naught save good. Allah beareth witness that they verily are liars.
ayas.transliteration: wal ladhīnat-takhadhū masjidan ḍirāran wakufran watafrīqan baynal mu-minīna wa irṣādal liman ḥāraballāha warasūlahu min qabl ۚ walayaḥlifunna in aradnā illal-ḥusnā ۖ wallāhu yash-hadu innahum lakādhibūn

ayas.arabic: لَا تَقُمْ فِيهِ أَبَدًا ۚ لَّمَسْجِدٌ أُسِّسَ عَلَى ٱلتَّقْوَىٰ مِنْ أَوَّلِ يَوْمٍ أَحَقُّ أَن تَقُومَ فِيهِ ۚ فِيهِ رِجَالٌ يُحِبُّونَ أَن يَتَطَهَّرُوا۟ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ يُحِبُّ ٱلْمُطَّهِّرِينَ
ayas.translation: Never stand (to pray) there. A place of worship which was found upon duty (to Allah) from the first day is more worthy that thou shouldst stand (to pray) therein, wherein are men who love to purify themselves. Allah loveth the purifiers.
ayas.transliteration: lā taqum fīhi abadā ۚ lamasjidun ussisa `alat taqwā min awwali yawmin aḥaqqu an taqūma fīh ۚ fīhi rijālun yuḥibbūna an yataṭahharū ۚ wallāhu yuḥibbul muṭṭahhirīn

ayas.arabic: أَفَمَنْ أَسَّسَ بُنْيَـٰنَهُۥ عَلَىٰ تَقْوَىٰ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرِضْوَٰنٍ خَيْرٌ أَم مَّنْ أَسَّسَ بُنْيَـٰنَهُۥ عَلَىٰ شَفَا جُرُفٍ هَارٍ فَٱنْهَارَ بِهِۦ فِى نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يَهْدِى ٱلْقَوْمَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
ayas.translation: Is he who founded his building upon duty to Allah and His good pleasure better; or he who founded his building on the brink of a crumbling, overhanging precipice so that it toppled with him into the fire of hell? Allah guideth not wrongdoing folk.
ayas.transliteration: afaman assasa bunyānahu `alā taqwā minallāhi wariḍwānin khayrun am man assasa bunyānahu `alā shafā jurufin hārin fanhāra bihi fī nāri jahannam ۗ wallāhu lā yahdil qawmaẓ ẓālimīn

ayas.arabic: لَا يَزَالُ بُنْيَـٰنُهُمُ ٱلَّذِى بَنَوْا۟ رِيبَةً فِى قُلُوبِهِمْ إِلَّآ أَن تَقَطَّعَ قُلُوبُهُمْ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌ
ayas.translation: The building which they built will never cease to be a misgiving in their hearts unless their hearts be torn to pieces. Allah is Knower, Wise.
ayas.transliteration: lā yazālu bunyānuhumul ladhī banaw rībatan fī qulūbihim illā an taqaṭṭa`a qulūbuhum ۗ wallāhu `alīmun ḥakīm

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ ٱشْتَرَىٰ مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ أَنفُسَهُمْ وَأَمْوَٰلَهُم بِأَنَّ لَهُمُ ٱلْجَنَّةَ ۚ يُقَـٰتِلُونَ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ فَيَقْتُلُونَ وَيُقْتَلُونَ ۖ وَعْدًا عَلَيْهِ حَقًّا فِى ٱلتَّوْرَىٰةِ وَٱلْإِنجِيلِ وَٱلْقُرْءَانِ ۚ وَمَنْ أَوْفَىٰ بِعَهْدِهِۦ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ ۚ فَٱسْتَبْشِرُوا۟ بِبَيْعِكُمُ ٱلَّذِى بَايَعْتُم بِهِۦ ۚ وَذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْعَظِيمُ
ayas.translation: Lo! Allah hath bought from the believers their lives and their wealth because the Garden will be theirs: they shall fight in the way of Allah and shall slay and be slain. It is a promise which is binding on Him in the Torah and the Gospel and the Qur'an. Who fulfilleth His covenant better than Allah? Rejoice then in your bargain that ye have made, for that is the supreme triumph.
ayas.transliteration: innallāhash-tarā minal mu-minīna anfusahum wa-amwālahum bi-anna lahumul jannah ۚ yuqātilūna fī sabīlillāhi fayaqtulūna wayuqtalūn ۖ wa`dan `alayhi ḥaqqan fit tawrāti wal-injīli wal qur-ān ۚ wa man awfā bi`ahdihi minallāh ۚ fastabshirū bibay`ikumul ladhī bāya`tum bih ۚ wadhālika huwal fawzul `aẓīm

ayas.arabic: ٱلتَّـٰٓئِبُونَ ٱلْعَـٰبِدُونَ ٱلْحَـٰمِدُونَ ٱلسَّـٰٓئِحُونَ ٱلرَّٰكِعُونَ ٱلسَّـٰجِدُونَ ٱلْـَٔامِرُونَ بِٱلْمَعْرُوفِ وَٱلنَّاهُونَ عَنِ ٱلْمُنكَرِ وَٱلْحَـٰفِظُونَ لِحُدُودِ ٱللَّهِ ۗ وَبَشِّرِ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
ayas.translation: (Triumphant) are those who turn repentant (to Allah), those who serve (Him), those who praise (Him), those who fast, those who bow down, those who fall prostrate (in worship), those who enjoin the right and who forbid the wrong and those who keep the limits (ordained) of Allah - And give glad tidings to believers!
ayas.transliteration: at-tā-ibūnal `ābidūnal ḥāmidūnas sā-iḥūnar rāki`ūnas sājidūnal-āmirūna bil ma`rūfi wan nāhūna `anil munkari wal ḥāfiẓūna liḥudūdillāh ۗ wabashhiril mu-minīn

ayas.arabic: مَا كَانَ لِلنَّبِىِّ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ أَن يَسْتَغْفِرُوا۟ لِلْمُشْرِكِينَ وَلَوْ كَانُوٓا۟ أُو۟لِى قُرْبَىٰ مِنۢ بَعْدِ مَا تَبَيَّنَ لَهُمْ أَنَّهُمْ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
ayas.translation: It is not for the Prophet, and those who believe, to pray for the forgiveness of idolaters even though they may be near of kin (to them) after it hath become clear that they are people of hell-fire.
ayas.transliteration: mā kāna linnabiyyi wal ladhīna āmanū an yastaghfirū lil-mushrikīna walaw kānū ulī qurbā min ba`di mā tabayyana lahum annahum aṣ-ḥābul jaḥīm

ayas.arabic: وَمَا كَانَ ٱسْتِغْفَارُ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ لِأَبِيهِ إِلَّا عَن مَّوْعِدَةٍ وَعَدَهَآ إِيَّاهُ فَلَمَّا تَبَيَّنَ لَهُۥٓ أَنَّهُۥ عَدُوٌّ لِّلَّهِ تَبَرَّأَ مِنْهُ ۚ إِنَّ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ لَأَوَّٰهٌ حَلِيمٌ
ayas.translation: The prayer of Abraham for the forgiveness of his father was only because of a promise he had promised him, but when it had become clear unto him that he (his father) was an enemy to Allah he (Abraham) disowned him. Lo! Abraham was soft of heart, long-suffering.
ayas.transliteration: wa mā kānas-tighfāru ibrāhīma li-abīhi illā `an maw`idatin wa`adahā iyyāhu falammā tabayyana lahu annahu `aduwwul lillāhi tabarra-a minh ۚ inna ibrāhīma la-awwāhun ḥalīm

ayas.arabic: وَمَا كَانَ ٱللَّهُ لِيُضِلَّ قَوْمًۢا بَعْدَ إِذْ هَدَىٰهُمْ حَتَّىٰ يُبَيِّنَ لَهُم مَّا يَتَّقُونَ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍ عَلِيمٌ
ayas.translation: It was never Allah's (part) that He should send a folk astray after He had guided them until He had made clear unto them what they should avoid. Lo! Allah is Aware of all things.
ayas.transliteration: wa mā kānallāhu liyuḍilla qawman ba`da idh hadāhum ḥattā yubayyina lahum mā yattaqūn ۚ innallāha bikulli shay-in `alīm

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَهُۥ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ يُحْىِۦ وَيُمِيتُ ۚ وَمَا لَكُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مِن وَلِىٍّ وَلَا نَصِيرٍ
ayas.translation: Lo! Allah! Unto Him belongeth the Sovereignty of the heavens and the earth. He quickeneth and He giveth death. And ye have, instead of Allah, no protecting friend nor helper.
ayas.transliteration: innallāha lahu mulkus samāwāti wal-arḍ ۖ yuḥyī wayumīt ۚ wa mā lakum min dūnillāhi min waliyyin walā naṣīr

ayas.arabic: لَّقَد تَّابَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَى ٱلنَّبِىِّ وَٱلْمُهَـٰجِرِينَ وَٱلْأَنصَارِ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّبَعُوهُ فِى سَاعَةِ ٱلْعُسْرَةِ مِنۢ بَعْدِ مَا كَادَ يَزِيغُ قُلُوبُ فَرِيقٍ مِّنْهُمْ ثُمَّ تَابَ عَلَيْهِمْ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ بِهِمْ رَءُوفٌ رَّحِيمٌ
ayas.translation: Allah hath turned in mercy to the Prophet, and to the Muhajirin and the Ansar who followed him in the hour of hardship. After the hearts of a party of them had almost swerved aside, then turned He unto them in mercy. Lo! He is Full of Pity, Merciful for them.
ayas.transliteration: laqad tāballāhu `alan nabiyyi wal muhājirīna wal-anṣāril ladhīnat-taba`ūhu fī sā`atil `usrati min ba`di mā kāda yazīghu qulūbu farīqin minhum thumma tāba `alayhim ۚ innahu bihim ra-ūfun raḥīm

ayas.arabic: وَعَلَى ٱلثَّلَـٰثَةِ ٱلَّذِينَ خُلِّفُوا۟ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا ضَاقَتْ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلْأَرْضُ بِمَا رَحُبَتْ وَضَاقَتْ عَلَيْهِمْ أَنفُسُهُمْ وَظَنُّوٓا۟ أَن لَّا مَلْجَأَ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَّآ إِلَيْهِ ثُمَّ تَابَ عَلَيْهِمْ لِيَتُوبُوٓا۟ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلتَّوَّابُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
ayas.translation: And to the three also (did He turn in mercy) who were left behind, when the earth, vast as it is, was straitened for them, and their own souls were straitened for them till they bethought them that there is no refuge from Allah save toward Him. Then turned He unto them in mercy that they (too) might turn (repentant unto Him). Lo! Allah! He is the Relenting, the Merciful.
ayas.transliteration: wa`alath thalāthatil ladhīna khullifū ḥattā idhā ḍāqat `alayhimul-arḍu bimā raḥubat waḍāqat `alayhim anfusuhum waẓannū an lā malja-a minallāhi illā ilayhi thumma tāba `alayhim liyatūbū ۚ innallāha huwat tawwābur raḥīm

ayas.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَكُونُوا۟ مَعَ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ
ayas.translation: O ye who believe! Be careful of your duty to Allah, and be with the truthful.
ayas.transliteration: yā-ayyuhal ladhīna āmanut-taqullāha wakūnū ma`aṣ ṣādiqīn

ayas.arabic: مَا كَانَ لِأَهْلِ ٱلْمَدِينَةِ وَمَنْ حَوْلَهُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَعْرَابِ أَن يَتَخَلَّفُوا۟ عَن رَّسُولِ ٱللَّهِ وَلَا يَرْغَبُوا۟ بِأَنفُسِهِمْ عَن نَّفْسِهِۦ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمْ لَا يُصِيبُهُمْ ظَمَأٌ وَلَا نَصَبٌ وَلَا مَخْمَصَةٌ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَلَا يَطَـُٔونَ مَوْطِئًا يَغِيظُ ٱلْكُفَّارَ وَلَا يَنَالُونَ مِنْ عَدُوٍّ نَّيْلًا إِلَّا كُتِبَ لَهُم بِهِۦ عَمَلٌ صَـٰلِحٌ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُضِيعُ أَجْرَ ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
ayas.translation: It is not for the townsfolk of Al-Madinah and for those around them of the wandering Arabs so stay behind the messenger of Allah and prefer their lives to his life. That is because neither thirst nor toil nor hunger afflicteth them in the way of Allah, nor step they any step that angereth the disbelievers, nor gain they from the enemy a gain, but a good deed is recorded for them therefor. Lo! Allah loseth not the wages of the good.
ayas.transliteration: mā kāna li-ahlil madīnati wa man ḥawlahum minal-a`rābi an yatakhallafū `an rasūlillāhi walā yarghabū bi-anfusihim `an nafsih ۚ dhālika bi-annahum lā yuṣībuhum ẓama-un walā naṣabun walā makhmaṣatun fī sabīlillāhi walā yaṭa-ūna mawṭi-an yaghīẓul kuffāra walā yanālūna min `aduwwin naylan illā kutiba lahum bihi `amalun ṣāliḥ ۚ innallāha lā yuḍī`u ajral muḥsinīn

ayas.arabic: وَلَا يُنفِقُونَ نَفَقَةً صَغِيرَةً وَلَا كَبِيرَةً وَلَا يَقْطَعُونَ وَادِيًا إِلَّا كُتِبَ لَهُمْ لِيَجْزِيَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ أَحْسَنَ مَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ
ayas.translation: Nor spend they any spending, small or great, nor do they cross a valley, but it is recorded for them, that Allah may repay them the best of what they used to do.
ayas.transliteration: walā yunfiqūna nafaqatan ṣaghīratan walā kabīratan walā yaqṭa`ūna wādiyan illā kutiba lahum liyajziyahumullāhu aḥsana mā kānū ya`malūn

ayas.arabic: وَمَا كَانَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ لِيَنفِرُوا۟ كَآفَّةً ۚ فَلَوْلَا نَفَرَ مِن كُلِّ فِرْقَةٍ مِّنْهُمْ طَآئِفَةٌ لِّيَتَفَقَّهُوا۟ فِى ٱلدِّينِ وَلِيُنذِرُوا۟ قَوْمَهُمْ إِذَا رَجَعُوٓا۟ إِلَيْهِمْ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَحْذَرُونَ
ayas.translation: And the believers should not all go out to fight. Of every troop of them, a party only should go forth, that they (who are left behind) may gain sound knowledge in religion, and that they may warn their folk when they return to them, so that they may beware.
ayas.transliteration: wa mā kānal mu-minūna liyanfirū kāffah ۚ falawlā nafara min kulli firqatim minhum ṭā-ifatun liyatafaqqahū fid dīni waliyundhirū qawmahum idhā raja`ū ilayhim la`allahum yaḥdharūn

ayas.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ قَـٰتِلُوا۟ ٱلَّذِينَ يَلُونَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْكُفَّارِ وَلْيَجِدُوا۟ فِيكُمْ غِلْظَةً ۚ وَٱعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَعَ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ
ayas.translation: O ye who believe! Fight those of the disbelievers who are near to you, and let them find harshness in you, and know that Allah is with those who keep their duty (unto Him).
ayas.transliteration: yā-ayyuhal ladhīna āmanū qātilul ladhīna yalūnakum minal kuffāri walyajidū fīkum ghilẓah ۚ wa`lamū annallāha ma`al muttaqīn

ayas.arabic: وَإِذَا مَآ أُنزِلَتْ سُورَةٌ فَمِنْهُم مَّن يَقُولُ أَيُّكُمْ زَادَتْهُ هَـٰذِهِۦٓ إِيمَـٰنًا ۚ فَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ فَزَادَتْهُمْ إِيمَـٰنًا وَهُمْ يَسْتَبْشِرُونَ
ayas.translation: And whenever a surah is revealed there are some of them who say: Which one of you hath thus increased in faith? As for those who believe, it hath increased them in faith and they rejoice (therefor).
ayas.transliteration: wa idhā mā unzilat sūratun faminhum man yaqūlu ayyukum zādat-hu hādhihi-iymānā ۚ fa-ammal ladhīna āmanū fazādat-hum-iymānan wahum yastabshirūn

ayas.arabic: وَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ فِى قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌ فَزَادَتْهُمْ رِجْسًا إِلَىٰ رِجْسِهِمْ وَمَاتُوا۟ وَهُمْ كَـٰفِرُونَ
ayas.translation: But as for those in whose hearts is disease, it only addeth wickedness to their wickedness, and they die while they are disbelievers.
ayas.transliteration: wa-ammal ladhīna fī qulūbihim maraḍun fazādat-hum rijsan ilā rijsihim wa mātū wahum kāfirūn

ayas.arabic: أَوَلَا يَرَوْنَ أَنَّهُمْ يُفْتَنُونَ فِى كُلِّ عَامٍ مَّرَّةً أَوْ مَرَّتَيْنِ ثُمَّ لَا يَتُوبُونَ وَلَا هُمْ يَذَّكَّرُونَ
ayas.translation: See they not that they are tested once or twice in every year? Still they turn not in repentance, neither pay they heed.
ayas.transliteration: awalā yarawna annahum yuftanūna fī kulli `āmin marratan aw marratayni thumma lā yatūbūna walā hum yadhhakkarūn

ayas.arabic: وَإِذَا مَآ أُنزِلَتْ سُورَةٌ نَّظَرَ بَعْضُهُمْ إِلَىٰ بَعْضٍ هَلْ يَرَىٰكُم مِّنْ أَحَدٍ ثُمَّ ٱنصَرَفُوا۟ ۚ صَرَفَ ٱللَّهُ قُلُوبَهُم بِأَنَّهُمْ قَوْمٌ لَّا يَفْقَهُونَ
ayas.translation: And whenever a surah is revealed, they look one at another (as who should say): Doth anybody see you? Then they turn away. Allah turneth away their hearts because they are a folk who understand not.
ayas.transliteration: wa idhā mā unzilat sūratun naẓara ba`ḍuhum ilā ba`ḍin hal yarākum min aḥadin thumman-ṣarafū ۚ ṣarafallāhu qulūbahum bi-annahum qawmul lā yafqahūn

ayas.arabic: لَقَدْ جَآءَكُمْ رَسُولٌ مِّنْ أَنفُسِكُمْ عَزِيزٌ عَلَيْهِ مَا عَنِتُّمْ حَرِيصٌ عَلَيْكُم بِٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ رَءُوفٌ رَّحِيمٌ
ayas.translation: There hath come unto you a messenger, (one) of yourselves, unto whom aught that ye are overburdened is grievous, full of concern for you, for the believers full of pity, merciful.
ayas.transliteration: laqad jā-akum rasūlun min anfusikum `azīzun `alayhi mā `anittum ḥarīṣun `alaykum bil mu-minīna ra-ūfun raḥīm

ayas.arabic: فَإِن تَوَلَّوْا۟ فَقُلْ حَسْبِىَ ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۖ عَلَيْهِ تَوَكَّلْتُ ۖ وَهُوَ رَبُّ ٱلْعَرْشِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
ayas.translation: Now, if they turn away (O Muhammad) say: Allah sufficeth me. There is no Allah save Him. In Him have I put my trust, and He is Lord of the Tremendous Throne.
ayas.transliteration: fa-in tawallaw faqul ḥasbiyallāhu lā ilāha illā huw ۖ `alayhi tawakkalt ۖ wahuwa rabbul `arshil `aẓīm
